title: Drone with Camera, 2K FPV Drone with Brushless Motor, Altitude Hold, Gesture Selfie, One Key Take Off/Landing, 3D Flips, Waypoint Fly, 2 Batteries, Foldable Mini Drones for Kids and Beginners
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【2K Clarity & FPV Real-Time Transmission】: Built with 2K QHD camera, the RC drone captures stunning 2560×1440 pixels photos and records smooth videos of your precious life moments. With the 110° wide-angle field of view and adjustable 90° lens, you can enjoy a real-time panoramic view from the sky via the app and easily share the happy moments stored on your phone or SD card to your social media platforms.

【Stable Flight with Brushless Motor】: The drone with camera is equipped with brushless motor that provides higher speed, efficiency and better stability to resist the breeze, which improves your stable flying experience than other drones with brushed motor. Moreover, comes with optical flow positioning technology, the mini drone can stably hover in the air to make you control the drone easily.

【Beginner Friendly & Long Flight Time】: The mini drone with one-key take off/landing, headless mode, altitude hold, and low speed(3 speeds switch) flying helps beginners and kids to practice the drone control skill and quickly get the hang of flying and enjoy the experience. Include 2 x 2000mAh rechargeable batteries to support 24mins long flight time, enjoy your worry-free flying.

【Play the Drone in Various Ways】: The drones for kids has mutiple functions controlled by "BLINORY GO" app, such as 360° flips, headless mode, waypoint fly, gravity control, gesture selfie, makes your flying experience more immersive and funny. A cool toy drone for curious and exploratory adults and kids.

【Ultra-Lightweight & Carrying Case】: The drones with camera for adults weigh only 145g, which is ultra-lightweight and the foldable fuselage design makes it compact and more portable to easily store with the carrying case, and ready for on-the-go travel. If the drone has any issues during the flight, please contact us, we provide 24-hours technical support for all the customers.

features: Super Cool High-Tech Hand Controlled Drone : Our flying orb ball featuring a gyroscope and smart AI chip that promises intelligent flight. Different throwing angles and speeds will create different flight lines and boomerang effect. This cool stuff not only brings fun to play but also helps to improve children's hands-on ability, operating skills, intelligence, and creativity.

Lightweight Body: This flying ball drone toy is made of high-grade ABS material, which is lightweight and flexible, making it able to withstand countless crashes. The propellers are safely concealed within the ball drone. The enclosed propellers cause no worry that children will be hurt by their blades.

USB Rechargeable: Simply connect it to the USB connector for 25 minutes to fully charge. (Flying time: 8 to 10 minutes). When the LED indicator flashes, it means that the aircraft needs to charged. The indicator light remains lit when charging, and turns off when charging is complete.

For Anytime, Anywhere Fun: You don’t need a lot of space to take off with our hand operated drone. It is fun and easy to control anywhere. It’s designed to work indoors as well as outdoors, with a smooth flight pattern and boomerang effect. It’s the perfect backyard activity, but can easily be used indoors as well. This flying ball is a great conversation piece for family, school, and holiday gatherings. It’s a simple way to teach about physics and aerodynamics, even from a young age.

Perfect Gift: This hand-controlled drone is a fun novelty gift for birthdays, Halloween, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas. This is a great choice for Easter, Father's Day, Mother's Day gift toys. It’s a perfect enrichment gift for kids, teenagers, adults, and the elderly.

features: Foldable and Lightweight: This quadcopter drone is small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, making it very portable. With its foldable design, the drone weighs less than 250 grams, providing the perfect solution for carefree flying in the US without the need for FAA or Remote ID registration. this changes the way you capture drone toy experiences, allowing both children and adults to create cherished memories.

HD Videos and Shock Absorbing Technology: Drone with 2K HD camera that can transmit 5GHz FPV. the 90° adjustable camera provides high-resolution images, Videos can be recorded and stored on your SD card or phone.the built-in shock absorbing technology ensures stable aerial video even in windy conditions, offering an immersive sky view experience. the drone also supports gesture control, making it suitable for selfie shooting.

Considerate Design: This drone comes with a carrying case for convenient outdoor travel,with built-in overcurrent protection and emergency stop.ensure a safe and reliable flight.2 batteries give you up to used alternately.can support longer flight times for you and your family, which makes your flight more exciting and interesting.

Brushless Motor for More Stable Flight: Our drones with camera for adults adopted with brushless motors, which have higher energy conversion efficiency compared to brushed motors. brushless motors have a longer lifespan, lower noise, and smoother operation, allowing them to better withstand wind forces. the drone is also equipped with a built-in altitude hold system that ensures stable hovering at the desired height. these features contribute to the drone's ability to achieve more stable and precise flight control.

Flight Tips: For your first flight, please follow the instructions in the manual for pre-flight calibration. If you are a beginner, practice flying in a windless indoor environment, with a flight height not exceeding 6 meters and a distance not exceeding 30 meters. (note: there may be wind interference when flying outdoors).

What is the flight time per battery? 
About 7 minutes per battery. HS210 got 3 batteries, a total of 21 minutes. 
What's the difference between HS210 and HS210T? 
HS210T features two battery while HS210 has three. Besides, HS210T combines land and sky mode/four posture deformations. 
Will my 12 years old boy be able to fly this drone easily? 
HS210 is designed to be easy to fly for pilots of all ages, including kids aged 8 to 12. Its simple and intuitive remote control, stable flight performance make it a great choice for beginners who are just starting out with drone flying. 
How can I know when the battery is running low? Will it suddenly fall from a high place? 
When the drone battery runs low, the indicator lights on the drone will blink continuously. About 1 minute or so the drone will automatically land on low electricity.

items.text: About 7 minutes per battery. HS210 got 3 batteries, a total of  21 minutes.

items.name: What's the difference between HS210 and HS210T?
items.text: HS210T features two battery while HS210 has three. Besides, HS210T combines land and sky mode/four posture deformations.

items.name: Will my 12 years old boy be able to fly this drone easily?
items.text: HS210 is designed to be easy to fly for pilots of all ages, including kids aged 8 to 12. Its simple and intuitive remote control, stable flight performance make it a great choice for beginners who are just starting out with drone flying.

items.name: How can I know when the battery is running low? Will it suddenly fall from a high place?
items.text: When the drone battery runs low, the indicator lights on the drone will blink continuously. About 1 minute or so the drone will automatically land on low electricity.

【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲, 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧】The drone's 𝐞𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐆𝐏𝐒 capabilities and return-to-home feature contribute to steady aerial shots and safe flight, allowing the drone with camera to return to its takeoff point with a tap on the phone

aPlusContent.title: From the manufacturer
aPlusContent.rawText:
From the manufacturer
Gravity Control 
With a built-in G-sensor, With the built-in gravity sensor, you can control the camera drone's front, back, left, and right movements by tilting the smartphone paired with the drone. Enjoy intuitive controls! 
Headless Mode 
In headless mode, the drone will fly in the direction the right stick is pointing. Based on geographic orientation, so you can fly the drone without worrying about which direction it's facing, especially if it's further away. 
1080P 3D Visual Enjoyment 
3D viewing mode, use VR glasses (not included) to directly enjoy real-time 1080P HD live video. You can get amazing visual fidelity and a great first person 3D view. Happy flying with family. 
Yeah gesture photography 
About 2m in front of the drone camera, place one hand flat and make a "yes" gesture. After the drone recognizes it successfully, it will start a 3-second countdown and take a picture automatically. To provide recognition, aim the lens as directly as possible and fly in a well-lit environment as much as possible. 
Palm gesture video 
About 2m in front of the aircraft camera, put your five fingers together and one hand flat. After the aircraft is recognized successfully, a 3-second countdown starts, and the video recording starts automatically. Recognize the same gesture again until the end of the recording (Time interval: the interval between two recognition should be greater than 3 seconds) 
Smart Voice Control 
Turn on the "Control Switch" and click the "Voice Control" button. 
Say "Fly, Land, Forward, Backward, Left, Right, Photo", the toy drone will reflect correspondent actions. 
Note: Use in noisy environments will result in low recognition rates.

title: Drone with 4K Camera RC Quadcopter for Adults, 1640ft Long Range Video Transmission, 3-Axis Gimbal, 46Mins Flight Time GPS Auto Return and Follow Me, Circle Fly, Waypoint Fly, Altitude Hold
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Aerial Photography and Videography: 4K integrated camera with 110° wide-angle and 90° adjustable provides a high resolution picture. Designed to deliver professional-grade imaging, our drones feature 5G Wi-Fi transmission, high-resolution lenses, image stabilization technology, and adjustable settings for optimal image and video capture. From scenic landscapes to action-packed adventures, our drones enable you to document your experiences like never before.

Intelligent Flight Modes and Automation: Our drones offer a range of intelligent flight modes and automation features that make flying easier and more enjoyable. With options such as GPS Follow, Route Planning, and Fly Around 360°, you can effortlessly capture dynamic shots and perform complex maneuvers. These intelligent features allow you to focus on creativity and storytelling, while the drone handles the technical aspects of flight.

Safety and Reliability : We prioritize the safety and reliability of our drones. They are equipped with advanced flight control systems, and GPS technology to ensure stable and secure flights. Return-to-Home functionality and intelligent fail-safe features provide added peace of mind, bringing the drone back to its takeoff point or landing safely in case of signal loss or low battery. Trust in our drones for a safe and reliable flying experience.

Compact and Portable Design: Designed with portability in mind, our drones are compact and easy to carry, making them for travel and outdoor adventures. Foldable arms and lightweight construction enable you to pack your drone conveniently and take it wherever your journey leads. Whether you're exploring remote locations or documenting your travels, our drones are the ideal companion for capturing stunning aerial imagery on the go.

Better Flight Experience: 2 batteries give you up to 46 minutes flight experience. With longer flight durations, you can cover more ground, capture more footage, and fully immerse yourself in aerial exploration. And functions like App-Controlled, Altitude Hold, Optical Flow, Headless Mode, One Key Take Off/Landing and Speed Adjust make it so easy to beginners or newbies.

Tip: To turn the drone on, press the power switch a total of two times. First short press to turn the power on, then long press the power switch to turn the drone on. If you can't start the drone or don't know how to operate the drone, please refer to the First Use Guide video on how to operate the drone, or consult our after-sales team.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Previous page
Next page
1 User Friendly 2 Thoughtful Design 3 Package Contents 4 Exclusive Support 
Palm Gesture Video 
Showing five fingers and a flat hand. When recognized, it starts a 3s countdown for video recording. Repeat the gesture for continuous recording. 
Yeah Gesture to Take a Photo 
Gesture "Y" 2M from the drone. When recognized, it starts a 3s countdown for a photo. Aim at the lens, and fly well-lit. 
Smart Voice Control 
Say "Fly, Land, Forward, Backward, Left, Right, Photo" for the toy drone to respond accordingly. Caution: Recognition may be lower in noisy settings. 
VR Mode 
Try the 3D viewing mode with VR glasses (not included) for live 1080P HD video. Enjoy a stunning first-person 3D view. Happy flying with family! 
Headless Mode 
It reacts to commands according to where you are or how you tilt the controller, no matter which way the drone is facing. 
3 Speed ​​Modes 
With 3 speed modes (low/medium/high), it lets you start at a comfortable pace, making it super beginner-friendly. Ideal for indoor and outdoor use. 
Trajectory Flight 
Draw a path on the app for the drone to follow in large open areas. Great feature for first-timers (try a straight line or small arc first). 
360 Flips 
Just press the 360-degree button on the remote control and the drone will do a 360-degree flip. What a fantastic flying experience!

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
KID-FRIENDLY MINI DRONE 
Scoot is a fun and easy-to-fly indoor drone for kids aged 8 and up! Whether it’s at a friend’s house or at home, this portable drone is a delight to fly with friends, siblings, and the whole family! 
Vibrant LEDs make flying Scoot extra fun in the dark! 
HOW DO I MOVE SCOOT? 
Use your hand to fly Scoot! All it takes is a gentle toss to get Scoot flying - no remote control needed. This mini flying drone changes directions based on the movement of your hand on the side or under the drone. 
*Please check the USB wire plug regularly before charging; do not use a broken charger. 
OBSTACLE NAVIGATION 
Launch this hand controlled ball drone in the air to see the high-tech 360° obstacle avoidance sensors in action at detecting obstacles and navigating any indoor space. The bendy, protective webbed shell keeps fingers and walls safe. 
YOUR PERSONAL DRONE PROS 
It all starts right here in Seattle. We’re in PST, but we conduct 24-hour monitoring and 1-on-1 communication, so please don’t hesitate to reach out if you need help. 
US-CERTIFIED STEM TOY 
WE TAKE FUN SERIOUSLY. Every Force1 product is tested in-house in our Seattle-area offices for ensured quality and safety. 
CONTENTS 
Scoot Hands-Free Auto Drone
USB Charging Cable
User Manual
Charging Time: 50 Minutes
Play Time: 8 Minutes
CHARGING INSTRUCTIONS: 
First plug in the included USB charging cable into your DC power source; we recommend that you only charge your Scoot using the USB port of your Computer/Laptop or Power Bank with a Current input of 0.5-2.0A.
Plug in the Round Pin of charging cable into the Scoot drone (charging socket can be found on the bottom of the drone, on the opposite side of the ON/OFF switch).
Do NOT exceed 50 minutes charge time – exceeding the charging time may damage the drone
Please allow your RC toy to rest 10 minutes between flights
CAUTION: Do not plug the charging cable into an A/C power source. A high peak current may be caused when the charging cable is combined with a wall charger and plugged into a wall outlet.

Portable 𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐝-𝐮𝐩 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 allows for convenient storage and fits in any pocket. (Folded Size: 3.5x5.6x2.3inches) ! 𝗔𝗧𝗢𝗠 𝗟𝗧 𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗻𝗹𝘆 𝗳𝗹𝘆 𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗣𝗦 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲, 𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝗼𝘂𝘁𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗮

【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚-𝐥𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝟒𝟎 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐌𝐚𝐱 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】Featuring a long-last 3000mAh intelligent battery, this drone enables an impressive 𝟒𝟎 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 on a single charge, ahead most of the other models. 𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐝𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐞 𝐛𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬 to practice cruising for longer distances

【𝟐.𝟓𝐊 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】ATOM LT supports 𝟐𝟓𝟔𝟎𝐱𝟏𝟒𝟒𝟎 aerial photos and 𝟐.𝟓𝐊@𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 HD videos. The ShakeVanish 2.0 stabilization provides superior camera stability and ensures clear, smooth footage. The camera is 𝟏𝟏𝟖° 𝐅𝐎𝐕 and vertical +𝟐𝟎° 𝐭𝐨 -𝟗𝟎° 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞, enables dynamic FPV experience

【𝟒𝐊𝐌 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐏𝐢𝐱𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝟐.𝟎】The PixSync 2.0 transmission system and dedicated remote controller maintain a smooth HD video feed at a distance of up to 𝟒 𝐊𝐌/𝟏𝟑𝟏𝟐𝟑𝐟𝐭. Experience minimal latency as you capture distant scenic beauty with precision

【𝐌𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐅𝐥𝐲 𝟐.𝟎, Perfect Entry-Level Choice】Built-in 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 ensures stability in 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝 condition. A simple and flexible control system is tailored for drone beginners. Explore 3 flight modes for an easy and engaging flying experience

【𝟒 𝐆𝐍𝐒𝐒 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐬, High-Precise GPS Functions】Our GPS drone supports 4 satellite positioning systems:𝐆𝐏𝐒, 𝐆𝐋𝐎𝐍𝐀𝐒𝐒, 𝐆𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐥𝐞𝐨 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐁𝐞𝐢𝐃𝐨𝐮, provide high-accuracy GPS positioning for Auto Return Home and enjoy fun features like Follow Me, Waypoint Fly, and Circle Fly
【Always Improving】 All firmware supports FOTA, we recommend keeping up to date with the latest firmware to enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality

【Kindly Reminder】ATOM LT App is compatible with iOS 11 and Android 7.0 or above, and we offer 2 types of adapter cables (Type C/Lightning) to connect your phone and the remote control, you can choose the one you need

features: 𝐄𝐧𝐣𝐨𝐲 𝐌𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐅𝐮𝐧 --- This drone features one-click takeoff/landing function, ensuring easy control, especially for kids who are not yet skilled. Also, its 3D Flips function adds an extra layer of excitement to the flying experience for kids.

𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 --- The Altitude Hold function enables itself to hover at fixed height stably; under Headless Mode, directions is always relative to where pilots face; offering care-free fly for kids, beginners, newbies, etc.
𝟑 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐬 --- HS190 drone comes with 3 speed modes (Low/Medium/High), perfect for kids with different skill levels to have different flying experiences.

𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 --- Propellers are isolated by the protection guard, which protects kids from spinning propellers. Also, Emergency Stop function supports the drone immediately landing so that to reduce the risk of damage or injury.

𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐢 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 --- 2.04''*2.04''*1.18'', easy to be folded into the controller and takes tiny space in your pocket or bag. Great idea to take it to the party, school, fishing, hiking, long journey, etc. Cool indoor/outdoor Chritsmas toy gift for boys girls and beginners!

Note: When using multiple drones at the same time, please be sure to power on and pair each drone and remote control separately to avoid frequency confusion caused by powering on multiple units simultaneously.

features: [𝗙𝗔𝗔-𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗜𝗗] Enjoy worry-free flights with 𝙞𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙜𝙧𝙖𝙩𝙚𝙙 𝙍𝙚𝙢𝙤𝙩𝙚 𝙄𝘿, ensuring safety and compliance. The Upgrade HS600 GPS drone has completed the FAA requirement. No need extra remote ID module.

𝟰𝗞 𝗘𝗜𝗦 𝗖𝗮𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗮 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝟮-𝗔𝘅𝗶𝘀 𝗚𝗶𝗺𝗯𝗮𝗹: HS600 drone with camera for adults equipped with a dual-axis gimbal, EIS stabilization, and potent brushless motors, ensures rock-solid flight stability while capturing breathtaking 4K video. Sony sensor-enhanced camera captures scenes with clarity, unlocking endless creative possibilities.

𝟭𝟬,𝟬𝟬𝟬𝗙𝗧 𝗟𝗼𝗻𝗴 𝗥𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻: Seamlessly integrating a WiFi repeater transmission into the remote controller, the HS600 effortlessly extends your camera drone control range and video transmission distance to 10,000 feet. HS600 FPV drones with camera for adults 4k long range. You'll be able to explore a wide variety of terrain and capture great photos from the sky.

𝗛𝗼𝗹𝘆 𝗦𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗟𝗮𝘁𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆: HS600, a GPS drone with camera, features Holy Stone's enhanced remote controller. Now you can connect your smartphone to the controller using just one data cable, and enjoy real-time image streaming without the necessity of WiFi! Set the social media stage on fire with stunning visuals from the Holy Stone HS600 GPS 4K drone with camera.

𝗟𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹-𝟲 𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲: Take your HS600 GPS drone on the go with the included portable carrying case. Weighing 541g, its lightweight frame is backed by brushless motors, ensuring impressive wind resistance up to 6 levels. Capture breathtaking aerial moments with confidence, thanks to powerful performance and unwavering stability. Elevate your adventures with the HS600 Holy Stone drone, where portability meets robust design.

𝗚𝗣𝗦 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗥𝗲𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗻-𝘁𝗼-𝗛𝗼𝗺𝗲 𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Rely on the HS600 aerial drone's GPS intelligent function for added security. Effortlessly activate one-key return, lost signal return, and low battery return features. Watch as the HS600 drone navigates back to its takeoff point, ensuring a safe and secure flying experience.

𝗕𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿-𝗙𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆: Seamlessly transition from enthusiast to expert with follow mode and waypoint mode. Whether you're charting a pre-defined course or carving a path of your own, the HS600 drone effortlessly follows, giving you the freedom to focus on capturing the moment.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Holy Stone HS600 | Elevate Aerial Perspective 
Go Far With 10,000FT Transmission 
2-Axis Gimbal & EIS Anti Shake 4K Camera 
EIS (Electronic Image Stabilization) technology analyzes real-time image changes and adjusts positioning to counteract movement-induced shakes. Combined with a 2-axis gimbal that reduces vibrations, this ensures enhanced visual clarity, smoothness, and stability. 
Previous page
In the box 
Next page
1 Built-in Remote ID 2 28-Min Flight Time 3 Package List 
More Intelligent Functions 
Effortless Tracking and Dynamic Shots 
Follow Me Mode 

The HS600 GPS drone features an advanced Follow Mode that intelligently tracks and follows your movements, capturing dynamic shots effortlessly. Whether you're hiking, cycling, or exploring, the FPV drone stays locked on, ensuring you're always the center of attention. Experience hands-free filming like never before, capturing your every adventure with precision and ease. 
Precision Flight Paths for Creative Vision 
Waypoint Tracking 

With the innovative Track Mode, you can pre-plan the drone's flight path by setting waypoints on the map. Watch in awe as the HS600 drone with camera autonomously follows the designated route, executing your creative vision perfectly. Whether it's mapping landscapes or filming intricate scenes, this feature opens up a world of possibilities for aerial storytelling. 
Reliable Safety and Secure Landings 
Auto Return Home 

Safety is paramount, and the HS600 4k drone's Auto Return Home function ensures no worry flying. In case of signal loss or low battery, the drone will autonomously navigate back to its takeoff point, landing safely. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing your drone will always find its way back, safeguarding your investment and precious footage. 
Compact Portability for Unbounded Adventures 
Foldable Design 

Designed for ultimate portability, the HS600 professional drone's foldable size makes it incredibly convenient to carry on your adventures. Its compact form factor ensures that it easily fits into your backpack or travel case, allowing you to take your mini drone wherever your journey takes you. Unfold the possibilities and capture stunning aerial views, all while keeping your gear compact and travel-ready.

items.subtitle: Reliable Safety and Secure Landings
items.text: Safety is paramount, and the HS600 4k drone's Auto Return Home function ensures no worry flying. In case of signal loss or low battery, the drone will autonomously navigate back to its takeoff point, landing safely. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing your drone will always find its way back, safeguarding your investment and precious footage.

items.title: Foldable Design
items.subtitle: Compact Portability for Unbounded Adventures
items.text: Designed for ultimate portability, the HS600 professional drone's foldable size makes it incredibly convenient to carry on your adventures. Its compact form factor ensures that it easily fits into your backpack or travel case, allowing you to take your mini drone wherever your journey takes you. Unfold the possibilities and capture stunning aerial views, all while keeping your gear compact and travel-ready.

features: Robust Brushless Motor Better Performance - Built in with a robust brushless motor, it provides the drone for adults with extraordinary performance in speed and power. Unlike a brushed motor, our drone for kids has features of longer life, less noise, and steadier performance. Flying our mini drones guarantees an amazing experience.

Capture 4K Pictures From Many Angles - Our FPV drone is equipped with a 90-degree adjustable HD camera that provides various benefits like high-resolution images, and captures sceneries from many angles. Mini drone with camera adopts 5G real-time transmission techniques that ensure fluent and uninterrupted transmission, even when kids drone at far distances, in high-speed flying, and under strong wind.

Optical Flow Positioning Sensor - An extra camera is attached to the bottom of the drone for kids 8-12, allowing you to capture some unexpected images. Aided by the optical flow positioning sensor, it greatly stabilizes the drone with camera for adults at a fixed height for taking clearer pictures easily.

Extend a Longer Flying Adventure - Our drone with camera comes with two batteries, which greatly extends the flight time up to 28mins. Moreover, beginner-friendly functions of drone for kids 12-14, such as 3-speed level shifts, 3D flips, headless mode, one click to take off/land, gesture control, and gravity sensing facilitate beginners to start their first flight easily.

Useful Tips Before Flight - Please always calibrate the gyro when turning on the drone with camera for kids every time, even after the drone crashes. All you need to do is pull down both joysticks on the left and right at 45 degrees at the same time until the drone for kids 4-6 stops flashing. The 2secs calibration greatly enhances the stable performance of the drone for kids 6-8. For any issues with our product, please reach out to our support team for a refund or exchange.

features: 📷【Drone with Camera】 Equipped with a 1080P HD 80°adjustable lens, the drone not only assists you in catching every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective, but also is perfect for selfie. It can even be used to check the roof of a house or other hard-to-reach areas. You can enjoy the real-time HD pictures and videos via the APP. Automatically take photos/videos with gestures.

👍【Long Flying Time and Safer】 The upgraded FPV drone is equipped with two enhanced batteries, extending the flight time to 25 minutes, providing no-worry flying experience. The controller has built-in battery and comes with 2pcs USB charging cable, enables you to charge it effortlessly. Features with emergency stop, 4 propeller guards, child lock feature and low power alarm to ensure a safe and reliable flight.

✈️【More Fun to Fly】 This foldable drone has 3 control modes: remote control, APP, and voice control. You can enjoy exciting features such as one-click 360° flips, 3D flip, waypoint flyflight, gravity control, circle fly, rotation fly, 3 speed gear, gravity sensing and Emergency Stop. (Some functions should be controlled by the app) You can also effortlessly command the remote control drone with simple voice instructions like "Take off"and more.

📣【Easier to Use】 This mini drone is an ideal choice for beginners to start their first drone flying adventure. One Key Start can help users to start flying easily. X62 is lightweight, portable and No FAA Registration needed, makes it a ideal drone for indoor and outdoor activities.

🎁【Cool Gift for Kids】 This camera drone equipped with smart functions such as Altitude Hold, Optical Flow and Air Pressure provide very precise and stable hovering; Headless mode, one-click start, speed adjustment and other functions allow players to easily control. Great idea to take it to the party, school, fishing, hiking, long journey, etc. It is a great birthday gift, Christmas gift for drone lovers, and curious and exploratory adults and kids!

🎖️【Trusted Flying Companion】 First flight tip- choose a windless indoor space, keep the altitude below 6 meters and the distance below 30 meters to help better practice and control the drone. The drone includes propeller guards and spare fan blades, ensuring safety and reliability. Detailed instructions are also included for easy mastery. Is this Foldable Drone suitable for indoor and outdoor use? 
Yes, this Mini Drone is designed for both indoor and outdoor use, but it is recommended to fly in open spaces without strong winds for optimal performance and safety. 
How to use FPV Mode 
When both the remote and app are connected to the drone, you can only use the remote to control the drone and use your phone for an unforgettable FPV experience. At this time, the APP only gestures to take photos and video functions can be used.

features: 【FAA Compliance】: This drone with camera complies with the FAA Declaration of Compliance and has a built-in remote ID module, there is no need for an extra remote ID module. You can find the remote ID on the Bwine F7GB2 drone arm including the QR code, if you still can't find your drone's RID, please feel free to contact us through the contact information on the manual or our App for assistance. In an emergency, our newly released B112 Remote ID can also help you track and locate your drone. If you need it, please search B0D7ZXX5KL directly on Amazon.

【Native 4K UHD Camera 】:This Pro drones with camera for adults 4k comes with 4K(3840x2160) resolution. standard HD (1920x1080) has only 2.07 million pixels, while our 4K UHD drone has 8.7 million pixels and is equipped with a 90° /120° FOV adjustable wide-angle lens, offering higher density for displaying more details and clearer images, including more realistic colors and adaptation to larger screens.

【Advanced 3-Axis Gimbal】This GPS bwine drone is equiped with The three axis(pitch, roll and yaw) , they are mutually perpendicular and can rotate freely. Through gyroscopes and sensors, they detect the orientation and adjust it in real-time to counteract vibrations or interference, ensuring stable imaging of the camera. Besides, 5x digital zoom also helps to switch between shots of varying distance, direction, and composition, making your aerial photography more diverse

【Level 6 Wind Resistance】: Flying our Bwine F7 drone, you will experience a quieter and more steady flight due to the low-noise brushless motors and level 6 wind resistance. Filming is easy and entertaining while you watch on your phone because this drone can hover in a place without worrying about moving

【50 Mins Flight Time】: The Bwine drones with camera for adults 4k comes with 2 intelligent batteries, each providing 25 minutes of flight time for a total of 50 minutes. To ensure optimal performance, please use a 5V/3A or 5V/2A wall charger to charge the batteries. It takes about 6.5 hours to fully charge the battery
【9800ft Long Range Transmission】: The Bwine F7GB2 drones for adults long range, has extended video transmission range up to 9800ft, providing you crisp images and smooth video

【GPS, No Lost Drones】: The Bwine f7 gps drones with camera for adults 4k is equipped with intelligent GPS-assisted features, including GPS Auto Return, Follow Me, and Waypoints. With GPS Auto Return, the drone will automatically return home when the signal is lost or the battery is low. You can also press the Return to Home button to bring the drone back to you. Losing your drone won't be a problem

【Quick Resolution of Customer Issues】: The Bwine Team keeps standing our F7 drones. You don't have to worry about your problem not being fixed as we are always responsible with our product, very quick to answer to an issue, and very eager to keep a customer pleased

【Share Your Joy with One Click】: The Bwine drones with camera can get the first view of the beauty and share it to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook and other social platforms through the APP to share your happiness with more friends

【Package Includes】: 1 x Bwine F7GB2 Drone, 2 x 2600mAh Batteries (11.1V), 4 x Extra Propeller Blades, 1 x Transmitter, 1 x Carrying Shell Case, 2 x USB Cable, 1 x Allen wrench, 6 x Screw, 2 x User Manual

title: Drones with Camera for Adults, Foldable RC Quadcopter, Helicopter Toys, 1080P FPV Video Drone for Beginners, 2 Batteries, Carrying Case, One Key Start, Altitude Hold,Headless Mode,3D Flips
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Multifunction Drone 】 Drone comes with one key start/landing, Altitude Hold, Headless Mode, Speed Adjustment functions, adapts to all experience levels even for kids and beginners. Through the APP Gestures Control Trajectory Flight and Gravity Sensor Control can be activated and allows you to capture selfie easily by Gesture Control.

【 Drone With 1080P HD Camera 】 The F62 drone is equipped with a high definition camera with adjustable angle. With the 120° wide-angle setting, Capture a HD footage and directly saved, share the amazing view to social media with just one click.

【 Real-time WIFI FPV Transmission 】 With a 120° Wide-angle 1080P HD Camera Wi-Fi real-time transmission FPV system can connect to your phone with the drone and the view will be shown directly on your phone, thus enjoy the world above the horizon, accurately capture photos and record videos for extraordinary moments.

【 Portable and Safe 】 The four propellers of the drone can be folded for you to put in our storage bag,So it is convenient for you to take it out to fly! With 4 Propeller Guards that fully protects the propellers and improves flight safety.

【 Long Flight Time and Quality service 】 3 batteries can support a 30 Minutes flight which makes it easy to replace battery and safe to charge battery.If you have any problems, please message us at anytime, we can reply quickly.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
MOCVOO Foldable Drone for Adults 
Equipped with a 120° Wide-angle 1080P HD Camera, including adjustable angle 
Equipped with Wi-Fi real-time transmission FPV system 
With one key take off /landing & altitude hold mode 
With 3D flips & Headless mode 
With gesture selfie functions, bring you more intelligent flying fun 
The RC drone can be carried around 
It is a mini drone for kids and adults, that’s a blast to fly and helps users learn about drones with Manual operation. It's easy for everyone to fly the drone. 
This drone is a perfect gift for lover, friends, family. Everyone should have a RC drone to experience the joy of control flight！ 
Flying Smarter And More Fun 
One Key Take Off / Landing 	Press the button to start or land the drone with one button, which is very convenient for beginners 	
Headless Mode 	Under this mode, you can play the drone without worring about what direction it is facing 	
Altitude Hold 	The drone will hover at the certain height when you release the throttle stick. Easy operation with extra fun 	
Three Adjustable Speeds 	It has different speed modes from low to high, suitable for beginners and intermediates and experts. You can have a different flight experience for fun 	
3D Flips 	Tap one button, E58 can perform a 360 flip and roll in any direction, makes the flight more exciting 	
Waypoints Fly 	Tap few flight routes on your phone, E58 will flight along the routes you set, to free your hands and discover unique view 	
Gesture Selfie 
With gesture control, you can pose to the camera to trigger phone taking and video recording. Free your hands free to take wonderful shot. 
More Flying Time 
Equipped with three 3.7v 600mAh batteries to supply more fly time！Easy to replace. 
Propeller Protection 
The propeller protective cover can reduce the damage caused by collision to the propeller blade, it is more durable.

title: DJI Neo, Mini Drone with 4K UHD Camera for Adults, 135g Self Flying Drone that Follows You, Palm Takeoff, AI Subject Tracking, QuickShots, Stabilized Video, Built-In Propeller Guard (Controller-Free)
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
description: * Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. DJI Neo must be activated in the DJI Fly App, to ensure a better product usage experience, please go to the DJI official website to download the App before use.Soar through breathtaking outdoor landscapes and explore stunning indoor scenes, ensuring everyone is included in the group photo. Discover a fresh perspective on everyday life with DJI Neo.DJI Neo comes in three purchasing options:The DJI Neo standard combo includes DJI Neo, a Battery, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.The DJI Neo Two-Battery Combo adds more flexibility to your flight time. It Includes DJI Neo, 2 Batteries, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.The DJI Three-Battery Combo provides extended flight time with DJI Neo, 3 Batteries, Two-Way Charging Hub, Propeller Guard (Pair), and more.
features: Lightweight and Regulation Friendly - At just 135g, DJI Neo may be even lighter than your phone and does not require FAA registration and Remote ID. Throw Neo in your backpack or even your pocket. Just grab and go!

Palm Takeoff & Landing, Go Controller-Free [1] - Neo takes off from your hand with just a push of a button. Neo's safe and easy operation makes it perfect for taking to family BBQs and hiking with friends.
AI Subject Tracking & QuickShots - Effortlessly capture stunning vlogs as DJI Neo smartly follows you. Getting professional footage has never been easier with eight creative QuickShots modes!

Multiple Control Options, Flexible Fun - Fly Neo controller-free or with voice control (EN/CN), mobile app, or RC. Capture an epic birthday or film a family picnic; these versatile options make it easy for everyone to try!

4K Ultra-Stabilized Video [8] - Whether you're hiking, kayaking, or just strolling in a windy park, DJI stabilization technology, level-4 wind resistance, and 4K UHD combine to ensure smooth, high-quality footage.
Full-Coverage Propeller Guards - Nervous flyers, let go of your worries! Dip and dive dynamically around your house and through tree branches without worry.*
The standard DJI Neo comes with a Battery, Propeller Guards, and more and is ready to use controller-free or with a smartphone.

* Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. DJI Neo must be activated in the DJI Fly App, to ensure a better product usage experience, please go to the DJI official website to download the App before use.

All With A Single Tap 
Palm Takeoff & Landing 

DJI Neo gracefully takes off and lands from your palm. Simply press the mode button on Neo, select your desired shooting mode, and Neo automatically does the rest to capture impressive footage, all without a remote controller! [1] 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
AI Subject Tracking 

Whether you're cycling, skateboarding, or hiking, Neo keeps pace as your personal photographer and ensures you are always in the spotlight. Equipped with AI algorithms, Neo can follow the subject within the frame, so you can set up captivating follow shots with ease. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Dronie 

The DJI Neo's camera tracks you as the drone ascends and moves backward, capturing stunning reveal shots of you and the scenery. The resulting dronie shot offers a seamless panoramic effect, adding grandeur to any location. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Circle 

The DJI Neo's camera orbits around you at a fixed altitude, capturing dynamic 360-degree videos. Choose the rotation direction for a comprehensive view from every angle, enhancing your presence in the environment. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Helix 

The drone elegantly spirals around you, creating captivating cinematic shots that keep you at the center. This feature elvates your creative toolset. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Boomerang 

The drone gracefully follows an oval path around you, capturing a dramatic shot that encircles you like a boomerang, adding flair to your aerial cinematography.

title: Drone with Camera for Kids Brushless Motor, 720P Drone,Drone for Children Beginners, Optical Flow Positioning, Obstacle Avoidance,Headless Mode,1 Key Start and Landing,2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Great Drone Toys for Beginners】Easy to operate for first drone flying adventure,One key to start,just press the start button the drone will take off from the ground and hover at a height of 1.5 meters without drifting or losing control.The bottom camera has an optical flow positioning function, which can easily identify the ground environment and help the drone to hang and take photos or videos at a fixed height

【Upgrate Brushless Motor Drones】compared with brushed motors,our brushless motor drones is 4 times longer lifespan than normal motor.on the side,it also make drones fly faster&stable.the composite material give our drone more resistant to collision or falling.Its quality performance makes it very suitable for beginners to practice flying

【Automatic photo&video taking 720P Camera】There are two cameras built in. During flight, you can view the dual-view camera content in real time through the mobile phone APP. The 2.4G frequency image transmission is more stable (please do not let the drone out of sight during use). The head of the drone is equipped with an adjustable angle 720P HD camera. When the APP controls the flight, the camera will automatically take photos or videos when it detects someone making a palm or fist gesture

【Optical Flow Positioning】Our drones have built-in simple flight functions, including optical flow positioning,360° flip, gesture photography, one-button takeoff and landing, headless mode, and four-way automatic obstacle avoidance. The fuselage is thoughtfully equipped with LED lights to help play at night, which is very suitable for beginners,it's also a interesting gift for kids

【26 Minutes Flight with 2 Batteries】2 replaceable smart batteries can work for 26 minutes after fully charged. Each battery takes 2-3 hour to fully charge. Our store also has separate adapter batteries for purchase. Search”K102 battery” to order

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Powerful Brushless Motro,Faster&Stronger 
When it comes to the comparison between brushed motors and our brushless motor, a remarkable difference emerges. Our brushless motor drones exhibit an astonishing advantage 
they have a lifespan that is an astounding four times longer than that of normal motors. This significant extension in lifespan not only reflects the superior quality and durability of the brushless motor technology but also ensures that users can enjoy prolonged and reliable flight experiences. 
On the side, this brushless motor brings about another notable enhancement. It enables the drones to achieve higher speeds and remarkable stability during flight.

title: Mini Drone with Camera for Adults Kids, 1080P HD Foldable FPV RC Quadcopter with Upgrade Gesture Control, 90° Adjustable Lens, Headless Mode, 2 Batteries, Carrying Case, Altitude Hold, 3D Flip
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: ✼【1080P HD Camera & FPV Function】 In order to make the drone capture clearer images, mini drone is equipped with a 1080P HD 90° manually adjustable lens, which effectively expands the field of view, so you can always capture the wonderful moments. In addition, drones also adopts advanced FPV real-time transmission technology, you can enjoy the view in real time through the App, and share what you see on your social media through the App.

✼【Multiple Functions to Meet Demand】 The functions of our drone are 360-degree rotation, route flight, headless mode, one-click take-off/landing, altitude hold, 3D flip, low power warning, gravity control, One click back, gesture selfie and other functions to fully protect children from propeller injuries, the RC drone allows you and your family to enjoy a safer and more reliable flight. All its features and excellent quality make it suitable not only for beginner, but also for skilled players.

✼【Foldable Design】 The foldable blades and gift box design make this quadcopter drone small enough that you can take mini drone with camera anywhere you like. Designed to be more user-friendly, it comes with a detailed manual that provides accurate instructions about the functions and usage of this drone. Now buy FPV foldable drone as a great gift for your friends, sons, grandchildren, etc. The sensor is compatible with VR glasses for an amazing 3D experience. (Excluding VR glasses)

✼【Safe & Reliable】with low power alarm, emergency stop and 4 propeller protection devices to ensure flight safety; 2 batteries provide you with up to 12-20 minutes of flying experience. Equipped with controller batteries, propeller guard, and spare fan blades, making this drone stands out in its class. When you see the drone's light go from constant to flashing, it's a low battery warning, and the player needs to control the drone to return in time to avoid losing it.

✼【Perfect for Adults and Kids】The operation of this drone with camera for adults is very simple, requiring only one key to take off and land, and even kids can easily control drones with camera for adults 4k. In addition, there are other features, such as headless mode, speed adjustment function, height hold mode and gesture photo/video, can be said to be a very suitable for everyone to start the drone.

title: DJI Mini 3 Pro, Mini Drone with 4K Video, 48MP Photo, 34 Mins Flight Time, Less than 249 g, Tri-Directional Obstacle Sensing, Return to Home, FAA Remote ID Compliant, Drone with Camera for Adults
inStockText: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
description: Overview1. DJI Mini 3 Pro must be activated in the DJI Fly App before use.2. Please check and strictly abide by local laws and regulations before flying.3. Tested with a production model DJI Mini 3 Pro in a controlled environment. Actual experience may vary depending on the environment, usage, and firmware version.Note1. Standard aircraft weight (including DJI Mini 3 Pro Intelligent Flight Battery, propellers, and a microSD card). The actual product weight may vary due to differences in batch materials and external factors. Registration is not required in some countries and regions. Check local rules and regulations before use. 2. APAS 4.0 is not available while recording 4K/48fps, 4K/50fps, 4K/60fps, 2.7K/48fps, 2.7K/50fps, 2.7K/60fps and 1080p/120fps video. 3. HDR video does not support video recording at over 30fps. 4. FocusTrack is not available while recording 4K/48fps, 4K/50fps, 4K/60fps, 2.7K/48fps, 2.7K/50fps, 2.7K/60fps, 1080p/48fps, 1080p/50fps, 1080p/60fps, and 1080p/120fps video.5. Measured at a constant speed of 21.6 kph in windless conditions. With DJI Mini 3 Pro Intelligent Flight Battery, the aircraft can fly for up to 34 mins. With the Intelligent Flight Battery Plus (sold separately and only in select countries), flight time is extended to up to 47 mins, but the aircraft will weigh more than 249 g.
features: Care-free Creation - Weighing less than 249 g, Mini 3 Pro doesn't require registration in most countries and regions. The foldable and compact design also makes it easy to carry on any adventure.

FAA Remote ID Compliant - DJI Mini 3 Pro complies with the FAA Remote ID rule. Please check the compliance document below to see the user guide for Remote ID, and you can visit the FAA's website for requirements of drone registration and Remote ID.

Perfect Portraits in a Tap - The redesigned DJI Mini 3 Pro offers True Vertical Shooting for portrait shots, ideal for social media. The gimbal rotates 90, so you don't have to compromise image quality.

Sweet Air Time - Enjoy an extended flight time of up to 34 minutes and capture and explore more of your surroundings. Upgrade to the Intelligent Flight Battery Plus (sold separately) and enjoy care-free exploration for up to 47 minutes.
Fly with Confidence - DJI Mini 3 Pro features tri-directional obstacle sensing and APAS 4.0, bringing unrivaled safety to the Mini series.
Create and Share On the Go - DJI Mini 3 Pro offers an extensive range of intelligent features including FocusTrack, True Vertical Shooting, MasterShots, Timelapse, QuickTransfer, and more.
Includes DJI RC-N1 allowing you to pack light and enjoy the creative experience.

Immersive Flight Experience - Enjoy immersive flights with DJI Googles 2, Goggles Integra, and RC Motion 2. Fly with goggles and a motion controller for real-time camera transmission and effortless control. Experience a thrilling FPV flight!

More Intelligent Functions 
Effortless Tracking and Dynamic Shots 
Follow Me Mode 

The HS720G FPV drone features an advanced Follow Mode that intelligently tracks and follows your movements, capturing dynamic shots effortlessly. Whether you're hiking, cycling, or exploring, the FPV drone stays locked on, ensuring you're always the center of attention. Experience hands-free filming like never before, capturing your every adventure with precision and ease. 
Precision Flight Paths for Creative Vision 
Waypoint Tracking 

With the innovative Track Mode, you can pre-plan the drone's flight path by setting waypoints on the map. Watch in awe as the HS720G drone with camera autonomously follows the designated route, executing your creative vision perfectly. Whether it's mapping landscapes or filming intricate scenes, this feature opens up a world of possibilities for aerial storytelling. 
Reliable Safety and Secure Landings 
Auto Return Home 

Safety is paramount, and the HS720G 4k drone's Auto Return Home function ensures no worry flying. In case of signal loss or low battery, the drone will autonomously navigate back to its takeoff point, landing safely. Enjoy peace of mind, knowing your drone will always find its way back, safeguarding your investment and precious footage.

title: FAA Part 107 Drone Exam AudioLearn: Complete Audio Review for the Remote Pilot Certification Exam
author: AudioLearn Content Team
breadCrumbs: Books › Engineering & Transportation › Engineering
bookDescription:
Developed by experienced professors and professionally narrated for easy listening, this course is a valuable tool when preparing for your Part 107 exam. The audio is focused and high-yield, covering the most important topics you need to know to succeed on the test. The material is accurate, up-to-date, and broken down into bite-sized chapters. There are quizzes and key takeaways sections following each chapter to review questions commonly tested and drive home key points.
In this course, we will cover the following:
Anatomy of a drone
Anatomy of a drone
Important aviation terminology and concepts
Important aviation terminology and concepts
Overview of the general knowledge test
Overview of the general knowledge test
The application process for remote-pilot certification
The application process for remote-pilot certification
Weather concepts and aviation weather reporting
Weather concepts and aviation weather reporting
The effect of weather on small unmanned craft
The effect of weather on small unmanned craft
Part 107 operational limitations for small unmanned aircraft
Part 107 operational limitations for small unmanned aircraft
Pilot health and well-being
Pilot health and well-being
Risk assessment and aeronautical decision-making
Risk assessment and aeronautical decision-making
We have also included a follow-along PDF manual containing all the graphs, charts, figures, and formulas we'll be reviewing in the audio.
The PDF also contains a complete practice test containing the most commonly tested questions tested on the FAA Part 107 exam with the correct answers.
PLEASE NOTE: When you purchase this title, the accompanying PDF will be available in your Audible Library along with the audio.

Please note, the more flips and the faster the flight speed, the shorter the flight time for each battery. The weight of the drone is only 155 grams, less than 250 grams, so it does not require FAA and remote ID registration. In addition, the drone has a control range of 328 feet , offering you a broader flying experience.

Foldable Design and Exquisite Gift: The drones for Kids features a foldable design and comes with a dedicated storage case, making it compact and portable. Whether you are traveling, camping, or on a family outing, this drone is your perfect choice. It is a creative gift for friends, partners, sons, or grandsons, especially suitable as a birthday or Christmas gift. We recommend that you test your drone in an open space or outdoor area without weather interference for your first flight.

How to start the drone? 
Please switch on the remote control and the power of the drone first, put the drone on the horizontal ground. Short press the one-key takeoff button for horizontal calibration, long press the one-key takeoff button for 2-3s, the drone can take off. 
How high can this drone with camera fly? 
The remote control distance of this drone is 100 metres and the mapping distance is 50-70 metres. Please control the drone with camera within your line of sight. 
Does the drone need to be registered with the FAA? 
The drone weighs only 155 grams, less than 250 grams, and does not require FAA and RC ID registration. 
Does the drone require an SD card? 
The drone does not require an SD card. If you want to save a video, you can tap the video icon on the app and it will record the video and save it on your phone. 
How do I know when the drone's battery is low? 
When the drone's battery is low, the indicator light on the drone will keep flashing.

Product Description
FLY INSIDE 
The Force1 Orbiter orb ball drones are designed to fly in an indoor flying zone. These indoor UFO drone toys feature advanced obstacle avoidance technology to avoid accidents 
GLOW IN THE DARK DRONE 
Fly day or night with the Obiter flying ball featuring bright multicolored LED light designs projected on ceilings and walls as it zooms across the room! 
EASY LAUNCH 
To launch, simply switch on, grasp the bottom of the drone ball upright in your hand, wait 3 seconds for the propellers to start, and release. The hands free drone will automatically hover in the air. The included one touch remote control can also turn the drone ON/OFF at anytime 
HAND CONTROLLED DRONE 
Fly this UFO drone with your hands! Use hand gestures under the flying ball to change direction, grab the ball from the bottom to turn off or use the remote to stop. Please keep fingers away from propeller blades at all times

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
360°Flips & Rolls 
One key 360° roll, continuous roll for perfect action and wonderful performance. 
One step start/take off 
One key take off/landing function adapts to all experience levels even for beginners. 
Headless mode 
No matter where the head of the drone points, the front of the remote control will be set as its front. In this mode, you can play the drone as you like without worrying about losing its direction. 
2 speed modes 
Simrex x500 Drone has 2 speed modes from low to high,suitable for beginners and intermediates and experts.You can have a different flight experience for fun. 
Dual-Assense Control 
SIMREX dual-assense control (mobile phone and remote control dual-assense control) can also be remotely controlled using a mobile phone or remote control, and can be controlled by the mobile phone when the remote control is disconnected. 
720P HD CAMERA 
Built-in 720P high definition FPV Wifi Camera, allows to take vivid aerial photos and videos, create a amazing impression of the sky. 
Gravity Control 
The Gravity mode enables the X500 to move in the direction of your mobile smartphone.

title: Mini Drone with Camera,1080P HD FPV Foldable Drones for Kids,Adults,Gesture Control, Stable Altitude Hold, One Key Take Off/Land, 3D Flips, Waypoints Fly, Gravity Control, Kids Drone,2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: ✈【Easy-to-Fly 】The mini drone with camera is designed for ease of use featuring multiple functions as Altitude Hold, Headless Mode, and One Key Take-off/Landing,optical flow 3D flips, two-speed modes,emergency stop, 360° flips, trajectory flight, gesture photo/video, low battery warning make the operation is easy and fun,it extremely user-friendly and suitable for beginners,it's the ideal Christmas gifts for boys and girls,wonderful gift for new year ,romantic gifts for your boyfriend,girlfriend.

✈【1080P HD Camera】1080P HD Camera - Equipped with a 1080P HD 90° adjustable lens, combined with the hover system and optical flow positioning technology, our camera drone is more stable when shooting. It assists you to catch the wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective. Using the "EEFPV" app and FPV transmission, Enjoy the thrill of exploring distant landscapes while flying, you can enjoy live 1080P HD pictures and videos and easily share with your friends and family.

✈【Compact and Portable】 Designed with portability in mind,our palm drone weights less 55 grams,this mini drone with foldable arms and lightweight construction enable you to pack your drone conveniently and take it wherever your journey leads.Whether for indoor or outdoor use, our drones are the ideal companion for capturing stunning aerial imagery on the go.it is an excellent toy gift for both kids and adults ,boys and girls or even beginners.

✈【Safety and Reliability】 Enhanced with a comprehensive outer casing that fully encloses all four propellers, reducing the risk of injuries and ensuring durability against impacts. Its Return-to-Home function can guiding the drone back to its takeoff point or ensuring a safe landing in the event of low battery. The Emergency Stop feature provides the immediate control needed to halt the drone's flight when faced with any issues, giving you confidence in a secure and dependable flying experience.

✈【Altitude Hold & Optical Flow】The hovering system and optical flow positioning technology ensure a more stable and controllable flight, keeping the drone at a certain height and capturing high-quality photos and videos,Optical Flow is a technology that allows drones to track their position and movement by analyzing visual cues from the environment, crucial for stable flight and navigation, especially in GPS-denied areas

✈【Gesture Photo and Video】Gesture Photo and Video lets you control drone cameras with hand gestures, enhancing the interactive flying experience. Ideal for hands-free capturing of images and videos, this feature is perfect for adults and makes a great gift. It's a high-tech, user-friendly option that adds convenience and fun during drone flying .This feature makes capturing pictures easy and fun, perfect for kids who love to take selfies with their drone.

✈【One Key Take-off /Landing】One Key Take-off/Landing is a convenient feature for the little drone, This function allows for effortless launching into the air and smooth landings with just a single button press on the remote control quadcopter, It's perfect for beginners, ensuring a stress-free flying experience and reducing the likelihood of crashes often associated with manual take-offs and landings. This feature making it user-friendly and accessible for all skill levels

✈【Headless Mode】Headless Mode on foldable FPV drones with HD cameras simplifies flying by aligning controls with the pilot's view instead of the drone's nose. This intuitive feature is perfect for beginners and aerial photography, as it lets you focus on framing without tracking the drone's direction. It boosts safety and control, making these drones enjoyable for all levels,especially suitable for beginners. Make it as an ideal Birthday or Christmas gift for kids or friends.

✈【3D Flip &Waypoint Fly】 3D Flip allows the drone to perform acrobatic flips in any direction with the push of a button, adding a dynamic element to flight. Waypoint Fly, on the other hand, enables pilots to plot a flight path on a map, and the drone will follow this route autonomously, perfect for capturing cinematic shots or surveying areas with accuracy. These features blend entertainment with functionality, making the smart drone flying more engaging and efficient.

✈【Excellent After-sales Service and Quality Assurance】Equipped with spare propellers, when the propeller falls off or is damaged, you can easily replace it yourself; Each drone is equipped with two batteries, if you need additional batteries, you can purchase them separately. We provide a 12-month warranty. If you meet any quality problems that are not artificially damaged, you can contact customer service at any time.

360° Flips: 	The drone can perform stunts in the air, rolling towards left and right,front and back all four directions. 	
Circle Fly: 	Press the "circle fly" button and the drone will start circular flight. 	
Auto-Rotation 	The drone can spin around automatically,just like a dancer. 	
Ligting Up Your Sky: 	All four frames and the top of the Q11 drone are equipped with colorful LEDs and will light up in turn! 	
Altitude Hold Function: 	The Drone will automatically hover in the mid-air. You have no worry about keeping the height. Just focus on the direction. 	
Headless Mode: 	Headless Mode brings much more confidence for the beginners, the drone will fly upwards, downwards or any other directions as according to the remote control. 	
High/Medium/Low Speeds: 	Three speeds setting (Low/Medium/High) is available to suit your operation proficiency or different flying environment. 	
One Key Start/Landing: 	Easy to start or land, simply tap the funtion, the drone will flight up automatically and stay flying or flight down slowly.

features: 【4K HD Dual Camera System】 Elevate your aerial photography with our drones with camera for adults 4k, boasting a front and bottom 1080p camera. Capture stunning visuals from every angle, ensuring every moment is preserved in breathtaking clarity and detail.

features: Easy to Fly - Our drone is designed to be as user-friendly as possible, featuring altitude hold, headless mode, and one key take-off / landing. This ensures beginners can fully enjoy flight without pressure, making it an ideal choice for kids and adults alike.

title: Mini Drone with Camera - 1080P HD Foldable Drone with Stable Hover, Gravity Control, Auto-Follow, Trajectory Flight, 90° Adjustable Lens, One Key Take Off/Land, 3D Flip, Drones for Adults Kids
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Multiple Functions Drone: Based on the newest upgraded chip than others, our drone has multiple interesting functions. Such as trajectory flight, gravity control, 3D flip, headless mode, 3 speeds mode, one-key takeoff/landing, gesture photo, and even VR! Whether you're a beginner or a skilled player, our drone promises an enjoyable flying adventure. (Some functions are controlled by the app.) It is also a great present for birthdays and holidays.

1080P FPV & Electric Adjustable Camera: This Oddire drone equips an HD 1080P camera, which assists you in catching every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective. The camera angle can be adjusted remotely up to 90 degrees. Combined with the upgraded hover system and optical flow positioning technology, the camera drone is more stable when shooting. You can enjoy a real-time panoramic view, and share them on your social media with ease.

Stable Hover & User Friendly: Equipped with an Optical Flow Positioning Camera, the drone has a more stable hover altitude ability, just calibrate it before takeoff (Turn on the drone, place it on flat ground, and move both joysticks inwards 45 degrees at the same time). Super suit for beginners! One-key takeoff/landing function can help users to start flying easily, the altitude hold feature allows the drone to hover in the air.

Long Battery Life & Cool Controller: With two rechargeable drone batteries, this kid's drone extends the flight time to approximately 25-28 minutes, providing a worry-free flying experience. Features with over-current protection and an emergency stop to ensure a safe and reliable flight. The Controller is so cool and gives you a familiar pleasure like dominating the game.

APP & Connection: Download the APP "ODDIRE GO". Place the drone on the ground, then turn on the drone and controller(they will connect automatically). Open the mobile phone's wifi list, look for the wifi starting with "ODDIRE_X-28_XXXXXX", and connect directly. The photos & videos will be saved to your phone directly, don't need an SD card, convenient and economical. If you suffer any problems, please contact us and we will help you within 24 hours.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Previous page
Next page
1 BEGINNER FRIENDLY 2 Full Protection Flight 3 3D FLIP 4 HEADLESS MODE 5 VR MODE 
Full Function Experience 	You can experience one key take-off/landing, trajectory flight, auto follow, gravity control, headless mode function, 360° flip function, even VR mode with our drone. 	
Frequency Alignment 	Place the drone on a horizontal surface, turn on the drone and remote controller in turn, they will automatically connect to the frequency. Then move the left and right joysticks inwards 45 degrees At the same time, when you hear a beep, the horizontal calibration is complete. 	
Gravity Control 	Select the gravity remote control mode on the mobile phone APP. At this time, the mobile phone acts as a plane, corresponding to the front, rear, left, and right of the drone. You can pan the drone horizontally by tilting the phone, just like playing a game. 	
Auto Follow Function 	Please use this function in a wide area, select this function on the mobile APP interface, and the drone will follow you. 	
Trajectory Flight 	Please use this function in a wide area. After selecting this function on the APP, draw a line on the app interface, and the drone will move parallel along this line (please draw a line with a small arc or a straight line the first time use it) 	
1080P HD WiFi Camera 	With a built-in 1080P high-definition FPV wifi camera, you can easily take vivid aerial photos and videos, and create an amazing impression of the sky. The photos and videos will be saved to your phone directly. 	
Stable Hover 	Equipped with the optical flowing positioning camera, the drone can positioned in the vertical direction, thereby improving the aircraft's hover stability. 	
Portable and Safe Design 	The foldable drones for adults can be carried around with a carrying case equipped for you. 25-28-minute flight(2 batteries), propeller guards, low battery warning, and emergency stop ensure the safety of the flight.

description: Overview3 cameras support focus following.Support Cruise Control, Waypoint Flight, and other functions.Notes1. ActiveTrack is unavailable at video resolutions higher than 4K or frame rates over 60fps.2. Flight Time was measured with Mavic 3 Pro flying at a constant speed of 32.4 kph in a windless environment at sea level until the battery level reached 0%. Data is for reference only. Please pay attention to RTH reminders in the DJI Fly app during your flight.3. DO NOT use the aircraft in severe weather conditions, including heavy wind exceeding 13.8 m/s, snow, rain, fog, hail, or lightning. DO NOT fly the aircraft 6000 m (19685 ft.) or higher above sea level. DO NOT fly the aircraft in environments where the temperature is below -10° C (14° F) or above 40° C (104° F). DO NOT take off from moving objects such as cars or boats. DO NOT fly close to reflective surfaces such as water or snow. Otherwise, the vision system may not work correctly. When the GNSS signal is weak, fly the aircraft in environments with good lighting and visibility. Low ambient light may cause the vision system to function abnormally. DO NOT fly near areas with magnetic or radio interference. Familiar magnetic or radio interference sources include Wi-Fi hotspots, routers, Bluetooth devices, high-voltage lines, large-scale power transmission stations, radar stations, mobile base stations, and broadcasting towers. Avoid sand entering the aircraft when taking off in desert or beach areas. Fly the aircraft in open areas away from crowds. Buildings, mountains, and trees may block the GNSS signal and affect the onboard compass.4. Measured in an outdoor, open environment, without interference, and with FCC compliance. The above data shows the farthest communication range for one-way, non-return flights. Please pay attention to RTH reminders in the DJI Fly app during your flight.
features: Hasselblad Main Camera - Mavic 3 Pro has a 4/3 CMOS sensor, 24mm format equivalent, f/2.8-f/11, 20 MP. The Hasselblad 4K drone camera supports shooting RAW photos with a dynamic range of up to 12.8 stops.

FAA Remote ID Compliant - DJI Mavic 3 Pro complies with the FAA Remote ID rule. Please check the compliance document below to see the user guide for Remote ID, and you can visit the FAA's website for requirements of drone registration and Remote ID.
Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing and APAS 5.0 - Mavic 3 Pro ensures you fly safely and create with peace of mind. Eight vision sensors work with a vision computing engine to sense obstacles.
43-minute max flight time - Mavic 3 Pro gives you more confidence to fly further and spend less time worrying about the battery level of the long-range drone with camera for adults.
DJI O3+ - Mavic 3 Pro features a transmission distance of up to 15 km with stable signals, presenting a more coherent camera view A professional 4K camera long-range drone for adults.

Includes three Intelligent Flight Batteries, charging hub, and more. The DJI RC Pro works with DJI 4K camera drones for professional users and features a 1000 nit brightness screen. With a strong signal and smooth image transmission.

Firmware upgrade - The new Vision Assist provides visual assistance and improved aerial safety in four directions. The 70mm Medium Tele Camera now supports 10-bit D-Log M & HLG color modes, expanding post-processing space.

title: Drone with Camera, 1080P HD FPV Foldable Drone for Kids Adults Beginners, Brushless Motor RC Quadcopter with Stable Hover, Gestures Selfie, Waypoint Fly, 3D Flips, One Key Start, 2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 1080P Adjustable FPV Drone: Equipped with 1080P HD camera and 90° remote controller adjustable lens, this drone can bring you a stunning aerial photography experience from different perspectives to broaden your views. By connecting the drone with ”DAZLEN FPV” APP, it allows you to view the fabulous scenery in live through the FPV technolog, immerse yourself in the excitement of the distant aerial exploration and share the extraordinary moments with friends on social media.

Multiple Functions for Freely Fly: This drone with camera features one-button takeoff/landing, optical flow positioning, headless mode, 3 speeds, gravity control, Low battery warning and emergency stop. Additionally, with the intelligent features like lightning-fast 360° flips, gesture control photograph/video, trajectory flight and music, it can add an extra dimension of excitement and entertainment to your flying adventure experience no matter you are a beginner or skilled player.

Beginner Friendly with Flexible Control: The camera drone provides effortless handling and flexible control for kids and beginners, allowing users of all skilled levels to master the flying skills easily and fly with confidence. One key start and emergency stop function can effectively eliminate the fear of first flight. The advanced altitude maintenance systems ensure a stable flight. And 3 speed modes make it possible for novices and advanced pilot to find their own way to explore the sky.

Long Flight Time & Full Accessories: Features with low power alarm, brushless motor, 4 propeller guards and spare fan blades to ensure a safe flight of the drone. The 2 rechargeable batteries can support a long flight time up to 26 mins and the dedicated storage case make it more convenient to take the rc drone outdoors, allowing you to experience the thrill of outdoor flight whether you are traveling, camping or hiking!

Trusted Flying Companion: For your first test flight, we recommend you to fly the drone with a propeller guard indoor or in an open space without wind. Elevating your using experience and maximize the drone's potential by watching video tutorials and instructions. This mini drone is an excellent toy for kids, friends and family. Any problems about the quadcopter, pls do not hesitate to contact us for 24-hour technical support and immediate problem-solving.

features: 【FAA Compliance】Ruko F11GIM2 drone complies with the FAA Declaration of Compliance and comes with a built-in Remote ID module. Just feel free to enjoy your flight.

【96 Mins Long Flight Time】F11GIM2 drone comes with 3 batteries which provide a total of 96 minutes flight time (32 minutes per battery), supports original batteries for operation and quick charging with QC3.0.

【Gimbal+EIS 4k UHD Camera Drone】F11GIM2 drone captures 4K photos and 4K/30fps videos, and features 5x zoom with a 100° FOV. 2-axis gimbal with EIS triple anti-shake technology helps to take more stable and smoother images.

【Level 6 Wind Resistance】With built-in 1806 brushless motors and strong arms, F11GIM2 drone can resist the wind of level 6. Experience more stabilized and clear shots at altitudes up to 6562ft flying up 393ft!

【Stable Real-time Transmission】F11GIM2 drone provides real-time flight data transmission up to 9800ft long range and upgraded digital remote controller, enjoying stable video transmission via a USB connection, no need to worry about disconnection problems.

【GPS Smart Return, Beginner Friendly】It will return automatically when low battery or signal loss. Also you can control the drone or just press the one-key return button on the controller to make it back. Never worry about losing your drone.

【Exquisite Storage Case, Easy to Carry】The carrying case is made of high quality material, more durable and stain-resistant. With exquisite shell design handcase, F11GIM2 drone is portable enough to bring with you anywhere and also an ideal present choice.
【Considerate Customer Service】 Ruko promises 30 days of return or exchange and 90 days free warranty. If you have any questions about our products, please contact us. PRODUCT SUPPORT AVAILABLE!

【Warm Tips】 It's important to ensure a safe and successful flight before flying a drone. Removing the gimbal cover and making sure the frequency connection is established are crucial steps to take. Additionally, finding an area with strong GPS signals can help prevent any potential issues with unstable flying.

title: Wipkviey Drone with Camera - Drones for Adults 1080P HD RC quadcopter, With WiFi Video, Altitude Hold, Gesture Selfy, Headless Mode, 3D Flip, One Key Take Off/Landing for Beginners - T28
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Easeier To Use: Multiple remote control methods and one-key operating functions are exclusively designed for beginners. You can switch the button control, mobile app control and other useful modes according to different situations.

360° Flip: Press the flip button and control the right joystick, the drone will rotate 360° in the air. press the “One Key Start/Landing” button, and the drone will take off or land automatically. The drone contains a total of 3 flight speed modes, low speed for children and beginners mode.

Gesture Selfy: Show your palm in front of the camera and the drone can take pictures automatically. Show the fist, and the drone will record the video. Adds more interactive fun to the process of using.
Optical Flow Positioning: With optical flow mode, it can fly stably indoors without interference from unwanted signals in the environment.

Low Battery Alert: Features a low battery alarm, 4 propeller guards to protect your drone, and 2 rechargeable batteries with enough power to support 24 minutes of flight, 12 minutes of flight for each battery. When one battery runs out, you can replace it for longer use and more fun.

Please Note: The drone will need to be recalibrated before take-off and after it has tipped on its side. If you do not calibrate before take-off and do not take off on a level surface, then the drone will fly diagonally after take-off and will not be controlled by the remote control, and will be 100% lost.

24-Hour Customer Service: If you have any drone problems, please feel free to contact Wipkviey shops, and we will get back to you within 24 hours(working days) to help you solve all your drone problems.
