title: Mini Drone for Kids 8-12 & Adults, Drones & Cars 2 in 1 Toy with One Key Take Off-Landing, Altitude Hold, Headless Mode, 360° flip, Car Mode, 2 Batteries, Gift Kids Toys for Boys and Girls
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Drone & Car 2 in-1 Design】: Exclusive advanced design, When you press the switch button, the drone indicator light will show green, which means flight mode; when you press it again, the drone indicator light will turn blue, which means the kids drone is in car mode. It can be used with the base to travel smoothly with other racing cars. Let your child have the feeling of running a racing car and flying a quadcopter at the same time.

【Car Mode】: We have equipped this rc helicopters with a base. It's so cool! Press the transform button to make the indicator light on the drone turn blue. At this time, you can control it to move forward and turn left and right (because the tail fan blades provide power, it cannot go back directly, please turn first). The smooth base with three-speed gears is suitable for most household carpets without worrying about resistance.

【Multi-functional and User-Friendly】: This dron has one-click takeoff landing, stable altitude hover, 360-degree roll, flexible headless mode, and fine-tuning functions. The intelligent chip allows you to control it to fly in various environments at will. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced person, you can quickly start playing. The default initial speed is first gear, speed up according to your needs. Come with 2 batteries and extra blades, cable fits your needs.

【Durable Quality and Longer Battery Life】: Using high-quality environmentally friendly materials makes the body more durable, and withstand countless bumps or drops. The four fan blades are wrapped for good protection, protecting your child from physical harm caused by spinning propellers. 2 batteries provide up to 20-30 minutes of battery life (20 minutes in flying mode, 26-30 minutes in car mode), longer using time than competitors.

【Perfect Present & 100% After-Sales Service】: As an exclusive two-in-one drone & car quadcopter, this toy is much more playable than similar products and will be the best car drones for kids. We provide 100% after-sales service. If the product you receive is defective or you encounter problems during use, please contact us in time and we will provide you with online services, including user guidance, reissue, and refund.

【About Operation】: After the remote control and the drone is turned on, you need to move the left joystick up and down to link the frequency. At this time, the drone's light turns blue, which represents car mode. You need to fold the drone's tail and use it with the car base. You can go forward, turn left, and turn right. Click the switch button on the remote control, and the drone's light will turn green, indicating flight mode. You need to keep the drone's tail flat for use.

How to switch between drone and car modes? 
Click the transform button, When the drone indicator light turns green, it represents flight mode; when the drone indicator light turns blue, it represents car mode. 
How to keep it stable and fly accurately? 
Please calibrate before each use, because the gyroscope data will be refreshed every time you use the headless mode, so you need to calibrate to reset the gyroscope before flying, then the flight will be more stable. 
Can children play with this? 
Yes, this is very easy to play and friendly to beginners. Even those who have never played before can easily control it with the function of one-click takeoff & headless mode. 
How long do the fully charged batteries last? 
This drone is equipped with 2 batteries, in flight mode, it can be used for 20 minutes around, and in car mode, it can be used for 26-30 minutes.

title: DJI Air 3 (DJI RC-N2), Drone with Medium Tele & Wide-Angle Dual Primary Cameras, 46-Min Max Flight Time, Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing, 48MP Photos, 4K/60fps HDR, Compliance with FAA Remote ID
inStockText: In Stock  Only 6 left in stock - order soon.  In Stock
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
description: DJI Air 3 comes in three purchasing options: -DJI Air 3 (DJI RC-N2) is the standard option and includes the drone, DJI RC-N2 remote controller, and other items for new users to get started quickly. -DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo (DJI RC-N2) includes the drone, RC-N2, three Intelligent Flight Batteries, a Battery Charging Hub, and more. -DJI Air 3 Fly More Combo (DJI RC 2) includes the drone, three Intelligent Flight Batteries, a Battery Charging Hub, and more, as well as the new DJI RC 2, which offers a bright touchscreen and the DJI Fly app pre-installed for an exceptional operating experience. Notes * Please check and strictly abide by local laws and regulations before flying. ** All data was tested using a production model DJI Air 3 in a controlled environment. Actual experience may vary depending on the environment, usage, and firmware version. *** All videos and images on this page were shot in strict compliance with relevant local laws and regulations. **** Before use, DJI Air 3 must be activated via the DJI Fly app. 1. The wide-angle camera and 3x medium tele camera have different apertures. 2. The obstacle avoidance action should be set to Bypass in the app. 3. Measured by DJI Air 3 flying at a constant speed of 28.8 kph in a windless environment at sea level, with APAS off, AirSense off, camera parameters set to 1080p/24fps, video mode off, and from 100% battery level until 0%. Data is for reference only. Always pay attention to reminders in the app during flight. 4. DO NOT connect the charger, connect external devices, or insert/remove any batteries when using the power accumulation function. 5. The 3x medium tele camera does not support the Asteroid QuickShot. Please check the "Product guides and documents" for the full version of these notes.
features: 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗵𝘁𝗮𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴, 𝗜𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝘁𝘀 - DJI Air 3's dual cameras offer creative focal-length options ideal for travel photography. Show off stunning environments and tell captivating stories through your lens.

𝗙𝗔𝗔 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗜𝗗 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗻𝘁 - DJI Air 3 complies with the FAA Remote ID rule. Please check the compliance document below to see the user guide for Remote ID, and you can visit the FAA's website for requirements of drone registration and Remote ID.
𝗘𝗻𝗵𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗦𝗮𝗳𝗲𝘁𝘆, 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗿𝘆-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗙𝗹𝘆𝗶𝗻𝗴 - Fly confidently with Air 3's 𝗼𝗺𝗻𝗶𝗱𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗼𝗯𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝘀𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴. It ensures comprehensive protection even in challenging environments like forests.
𝗦𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝟰𝟴𝗠𝗣 𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗖𝗿𝗼𝗽𝘀 - Air 3 captures impressive 48MP images, allowing for remarkable crops. Even quickly snapped travel photos can be cropped to reveal surprising details.
𝗜𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗙𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗥𝗶𝗰𝗵 𝗗𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗶𝗹𝘀 - Record stunning 4K/60fps HDR videos with the dual cameras. Experience breathtaking visuals with vibrant colors and lifelike details.

𝗦𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗢𝟰 𝗛𝗗 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗦𝗺𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝗙𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀 - The six-antenna array significantly improves video transmission. Enjoy a stable 1080p/60fps live feed 𝘂𝗽 𝘁𝗼 𝟮𝟬 𝗸𝗺, ensuring smooth flights with clear and reliable transmission.

Due to platform compatibility issue, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Fly.
With DJI Goggles Integra, DJI Goggles 2, and DJI RC Motion 2, Air 3 is primed to give you an exhilarating first-person flight experience.
* 𝗕𝗮𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘆 𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝘀𝗼𝗹𝗱 𝘀𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗹𝘆. It is recommended to purchase the DJI 65W Portable Charger or DJI 100W USB-C Power Adapter.
Firmware Update - The new Vision Assist feature provides visual assistance and improved aerial safety in four directions, and the new ActiveShots 360° delivers enhanced subject-tracking capabilities.

From the manufacturer
DJI Air 3 | Dual-Camera Drone for Travel Photography

1 Advanced Sensing 2 Extended Battery 3 Updated Charging Hub 4 O4 Transmission 
Easily Epic: Intelligent Features 
Vision Assist, Compose with Confidence 

Air 3 can provide real-time views from the front, back, left, and right. Whether executing camera movements like circling and pulling away, using the medium tele camera, or capturing nighttime shots, this feature empowers you to maintain full awareness of the surroundings and create with more confidence. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
ActiveShots 360°, Your Aerial Photographer [8] 

Creative aerial shots have never been easier thanks to Air 3's ActiveShots 360° feature. When paired with the omnidirectional vision sensing system and 3x medium tele camera, it enables you to capture cinematic footage that keeps your subject in focus. Try Manual mode to customize your flight path with a subject centered, or Auto mode for automatically planned flight paths. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
QuickShots 

Both cameras suport QuickShots like Rocket, Dronie, Circle, Helix, Boomerang. [7] Asteroid is not supported when using the medium tele camera. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
MasterShots 

This feature automatically shoots multiple angles and shots and edits footage with music for an instantly cinematic and shareable video of any location. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
Timelapse & Hyperlapse 

Both cameras support 4K horizontal timelapse video and 2.7K cropped vertical timelapse video. Hyperlapse offers multiple modes like Free, Course Lock, Circle, and Waypoint. 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
One-Tap Edits with LightCut 

Use the LightCut app to apply amazing special effects to your shots with just one tap, giving you effortlessly eye-catching footage.

title: Super Enduring Brushless Motor Drone with Camera for Beginners, CHUBORY A68 WiFi FPV Quadcopter with 2K HD Camera, Auto Hover, 3D Flips, Headless Mode, Trajectory Flight, 2 Batteries, Carrying Case
inStockText: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Strong Brushless Motors & Upgraded Batteries: Enduring alloy brushless motors feature strong wind resistance, providing faster, quieter, and more powerful flight. Equipped with 2 upgraded batteries, it can provide up to 36 minutes flight time, let your drone traveling in the sky freely.

Longer Service Life: Brushless motor can avoid the problems that ordinary motor will burn out during long flight. The upgraded composite material increases the strength of the drone and makes it more resistant to falling or collision.

All Function: A68 is extremely user-friendly that comes with One Key Start/Landing, Optical Flow Positioning, Altitude Hold, 3D Flips, Headless Mode, Speed Adjustment, Gesture Selfie and Trajectory Flight functions, adapts to all experience levels even for beginners.

HD Adjustable Camera: Equipped with a HD camera that can be adjusted within 90 degrees by your remote control or the app, dual cameras can give you an exciting experience of aerial scenery, and assist you to catch every wonderful moment from a birds-eye perspective.

Order with Confidence: This drone weighs less than 249g and does not require registration. The compact, foldable design and portable carrying case allow you to take the drone anywhere easily. A one-year warranty and a permanent support guarantee ensure that you can purchase with confidence.

title: Drones with Camera 1080P for Kids Adults, Gifts for Men Boys Beginner, Brushless Motor FPV 120° Foldable RC Drone, 5G WiFi, Gravity Control, Gesture Photography, 2 Batteries&Carrying Case
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Brushless Drones: Experience the superior performance of drones for adults with brushless motors, engineered for longer life and greater energy efficiency compared to traditional brushed models. With a specialized fan blade design, these FPV drones achieve higher flight speeds while consuming less power. Advanced altitude hold technology guarantees steady hovering at your desired height, ensuring smooth flights

Crystal-Clear 1080P HD Camera with FPV: Capture every detail with precision using our cutting-edge drone with camera featuring a 1080P UHD camera, designed for flawless image stabilization and breathtaking clarity. Your videos and photos will be crisp and vivid, even during dynamic movements. Thanks to the ultra-smooth FPV transmission and a 90° adjustable lens, you'll experience an immersive view from above, making each flight an adventure in stunning detail

Extended Flight Time, Portability: Maximize your flight experience with an upgraded dual-battery system, offering up to 30 minutes of continuous flight time. Equipped with USB 3.0 technology for faster, safer charging, it supports USB-C/PD and comes with UL-certified batteries capable of up to 500 recharge cycles. The drone's foldable design and dedicated storage box make it easy to pack and carry, giving you the freedom to take your mini drone on outdoor adventures with unmatched convenience

Beyond-Range and Data Loss Alert: Always stay informed about your drone's location, ensuring a safer and more reliable flying experience whether indoors or outdoors. The beyond-range alert (328-492ft) empowers users with control boundaries, minimizing the risk of losing the drone. However, it is important to note that in high wind conditions, cautious flying (preferably in second or third speed mode) is advised to prevent drone loss

Safe and Flexible Flying: Experience ultimate convenience with multiple control options, including remote controller and app. The responsive gesture photo feature lets you capture every exciting moment effortlessly. Advanced optical flow positioning ensures stable flight even in low-signal areas. With user-friendly functions like one-key takeoff/landing, emergency stop, and altitude hold, this camera drone is perfect for beginners

No FAA or Remote ID Registration Needed: Introducing the PL510, an ultra-light motor drone with 1080P camera. Weighing less than 250 grams, it meets U.S. regulations, so you can fly without worrying about FAA or Remote ID registration. This FPV drone is perfect for capturing stunning aerial shots, offering unmatched convenience and performance. Whether you're a hobbyist or a pro, it's the ideal choice for seamless flying anytime, especially for drone for kids 10-12 and drones for kids 8-12

PLEGBLE: Elevate Your Drone Experience: Discover the powerful features of the upgraded PL-510 drone, designed to enhance your flying and photography experience. We offer detailed video tutorials and comprehensive instructions to help you maximize its advanced capabilities. Have questions? Our dedicated customer support is always ready to assist you, ensuring that any issues are resolved quickly so you can enjoy a seamless flying experience

title: Mirason Drone with Camera, 1080P HD FPV Camera Drone with Brushless Motor, 2 Batteries, 360 Flips, Headless Mode, Gravity Control, 36 Mins Long, Flight Foldable Mini Drone for Kids and Beginner
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 90° Adjustable 1080P Camera Drone: Capture stunning aerial photos and videos with our 90° adjustable 1080P HD camera mini drone. Use the “Mirason” app to connect and control your remote control drone, enjoying real-time first-person viewing (FPV). Perfect for kids and beginners, this small drone lets you explore breathtaking landscapes and capture unforgettable moments, ideal for sharing on social media!

Dual Battery and Brushless Motor: Our camera drone features a brushless motor for superior efficiency and longevity. Operating quietly and smoothly, this foldable drone can resist wind easily. With two 1500mAh batteries, enjoy up to 36 minutes of flight time, making every adventure with your kid drone even more memorable.

User-Friendly for Beginners and Kids: Worried about flying a drone for the first time? This drone for kids includes one-key takeoff/landing, three-speed settings, headless mode, altitude hold, low battery warnings, and emergency landing functions. Designed for beginners, it helps everyone quickly learn to fly and enjoy the thrill.

Exciting Features for Fun Flights: Enhance your flying experience with fun features like gesture control for photo/video capture, waypoint flying, voice control, FPV mode, gravity control VR mode, and 360° flips. This mini drone with a camera sparks curiosity and adventure for kids and adults , making every flight exciting.

Perfect Gift and Caring Customer Support: This foldable drone fits neatly into the included carrying case, making it easy to take anywhere. It’s a cool gift for all ages—ideal for birthdays, Christmas, or special occasions. If you have questions about your camera drone, our customer support team is ready to assist you within 24 hours.

Tips for First-Time Users: For the best experience, fly your small drone in an open, windless area during your first outing. Remember to calibrate the drone’s level position before takeoff, and refer to the quick-start guide included with your remote control for easy setup.

How long can the PL-511 drone fly? 
The kit includes three batteries, each supporting 15 minutes of flight, extending the total flight time to 45 minutes. It also comes with a portable carrying case for convenience. 
What is the camera quality of this PL-511 drone? 
Our 4K UHD camera features image stabilization technology, higher bit rates, and optimized camera module for clearer visuals. Combined with ultra-smooth FPV transmission and adjustable 90° lens, it offers unprecedented immersive flying experience. 
What are the advantages of brushless motors? 
Compared to brushed drones, brushless drone motors offer stronger power, lower noise, stable flight, higher speed, and longer lifespan. They reduce the need for motor maintenance and ensure a more stable flight. 
How do I open the app to view the drone screen? 
1. Power on the drone. 
2. Open Wi-Fi settings on your phone/device and connect to the drone's Wi-Fi signal (PL-511 Drone-xxxxxx). 
3. Open the drone app, tap "Continue to connect to this Wi-Fi," then tap "Enter" to view.

title: Specta Mini GPS Drone with 4K UHD Camera, Under 249g, 3 Aixs Gimbal Drone with 10KM FPV Transmission, 4K/30fps Video, 31-Min Flight, Auto Return, Lightweight and Foldable Drone for Adults Beginners
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【Lightweight, No Registration Needed】The Specta Mini drone is a lightweight, palm-sized device that requires no FAA or Remote ID registration. With a weight of less than 249g, this compact drone is ideal for users who want a portable and convenient flying experience.

【Steady 4K UHD Camera & 3-Axis Gimbal 】The 4K camera drone is equipped with a 1/2.3” CMOS and a 3-axis gimbal, capable of shooting 4K/30fps video. It is designed to capture the beauty of life with stability and precision, and supports up to 4x digital zoom to vividly reproduce scenic details.

【32800 Feet Long Range Transmission】The Specta Mini drone has a control range of up to 10KM/32800ft, allowing you to fly further and capture more. Its stronger anti-interference capabilities ensure you can fly with confidence.

【Level-5 Wind Resistant 】The Specta Mini GPS drone with camera for adults has a 3-axis gimbal that guarantees smooth and steady footage, even in windy conditions. Its brushless motors provide enhanced power and allow takeoff at altitudes up to 4,000 meters.

【31 Minutes Flight】The Specta Mini Drone for adults comes with a 2250mAh Lithium Ion battery that lasts up to 31 minutes. Additional battery packs are also available to extend battery life. Fly more, charge less. Capture the creative moments around you with complete freedom.
【Quick Shots】Get Cinematic Shots With a Single Tap,With just a few taps, the mini 4k automatically records and shoots professional-grade video. Amazing drone photography has never been easier!

【Beginner-Friendly】The Mini 4K drone is ready to fly with one-button takeoff/landing, GPS Return to Home, and stable hovering. No complex preparation is needed. Even beginners can fly confidently and with ease.

inStockText: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.  Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐭 𝐎𝐧𝐥𝐲 𝟐𝟑𝟓𝐠, 𝐍𝐨 𝐅𝐀𝐀 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝】The Veeniix V11MINI SE drone offers ultimate portability. Carry and fly it effortlessly for outdoor adventures or everyday moments. Save time and hassle with no FAA registration needed, embracing the joy and freedom of flight instantly.

【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚 𝟒𝐊 𝐇𝐃 𝐈𝐦𝐚𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐚𝐩𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲】 The V11MINI SE drone comes equipped with a high-performance camera capable of supporting 4K photo and 4K/20FPS video recording (stored on an SD Card).Whether capturing breathtaking landscapes or intricate portraits, every moment is rendered in stunning ultra-HD resolution, making every flight a visual masterpiece.

【𝟕𝟎 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠-𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】Equipped with two batteries(each lasting 35Mins), the total flight time reaches up to 70Mins, allowing you to experience the thrill of long-distance flight. Soar above stunning landscapes and capture breathtaking shots, letting nothing limit your exploration.

【𝐔𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐍𝐨 𝐀𝐟𝐫𝐚𝐢𝐝 𝐨𝐟 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐮𝐩𝐭𝐞𝐝】V11MINI SE comes with a 9842FT(3KM) ultra-long-range digital image transmission, enabling stable transmission of high-definition images and capturing wonderful moments anytime, anywhere.

【𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥, 𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬】Our drone boasts one-key takeoff/landing, auto return, and a beginner-friendly mode, simplifying flight operations for both novices and experienced pilots, offering unmatched convenience.

【𝐅𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐌𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐝𝐬 𝐄𝐧𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐲】The V11MINI SE drone features GPS, Barometric Altitude Hold, Optical Flow Positioning, and TOF to provide reliable hovering stability and enhance landing safety, especially during low-altitude flights.

【𝐅𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐒𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐲 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐀𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐡𝐲】Download the Veeniix PRO APP to access its one-click operations: Route Rules, GPS Follow, Point of Interest, Ges Quickshot/Ges Record, and Image Follow. These modes are tailored to your shooting needs, making the photography process both simple and swift.

【𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐖𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐠𝐞】We offer a comprehensive 1-year quality warranty for your peace of mind. For any technical support or inquiries about drone accessories, please reach out to our dedicated Veeniix Support Team for exceptional service and assistance.

title: 4K Drone with Camera for Adults, GPS, EIS, Altitude Hold, Waypoint Fly, Circle Fly, 2 Batteries, Carrying Case - Perfect for Aerial Photography & Videography, Time-lapse Photo, Follow Me, Auto Return
inStockText: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.  Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Stunning 4K Camera: Capture breathtaking aerial footage with the 4K camera for photo, 1080P@30fps video from phone(4K@30fps from TF card), featuring a 120° wide-angle lens. Max Transmission Distance is 2,600 feet, ensuring clear and smooth memories of every scene.

GPS Auto Return & Easy-to-Fly Features: With Altitude Hold, One Key Start, Emergency Stop, and Optical Flow Positioning, the mini Drone is incredibly user-friendly. GPS-assisted flight allows for automatic return home when the drone loses signal, goes out of range, or low power, ensuring a safe and worry-free flying experience.

Convenient Design: The drone comes with 2x batteries that supports up to 40 minutes of flight time. It weighs < 250g, no FAA registration required. the foldable design and carrying case make it the perfect companion for your travels. The fuselage design is easy to store and more portable for outdoors.

Endless Fun with Numerous Additional Features: The Drone features Follow Me mode, allowing you to take complex shots hands-free. With 2.4G WIFI, you can connect to the app, take pictures/videos, and enjoy real-time transmission through your phone's camera. Waypoint Flight Mode and Fixed Point Surround make aerial photography easier than ever.

Powerful Brushless Motor: The brushless motors provide a stable and powerful flying experience, even in high wind levels. They have a significantly longer service life than ordinary motors and require no complicated preparation work before each flight, making them super friendly for novice pilots.

title: Holy Stone HS720 GPS Drone with Camera for Adults 4K UHD, 52 Minutes Flight Time, Foldable Quadcopter with Brushless Motor, Auto Return Home, Follow Me, Long Control Range
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 4K UHD Camera with Image Stabilization: The optimized full HD Camera built with Shock Absorption holder ensures shooting 3840 x 2160 high-resolution images and videos without camera vibration. 5GHz FPV transmission and 90°adjustable lens enable you to see the world from different angles.

GPS Assisted Intelligent Flight: Never lose the drone. It returns automatically whenever battery is low, signal is lost or you press one key return. Also, it is so smart to fly at your will, following you automatically, flying along a path you set, or fly around a point in circles. You may focus on your photography and creation.

Configuration Upgrade: The 2 intelligent batteries works for 26 Mins/per battery for each charge; 52 Mins in total with 2 batteries; the long-life Brushless Motors have lower power consumption and give you a quieter flight; the foldable design and well-fitted carrying case make it easy to take the drone outdoor. DON'T use batteries from other brands, which may cause product issue or safety concern! PRODUCT SUPPORT AVAILABLE!

Simple Operation: Equipped Multi Sensors guarantee hovering with great stability and high quality pics taken under different flying environment; Optical Flow Positioning makes great effect when GPS signal is lost or weak. Functions, like one key start/stop, emergency stop, altitude hold and electric fence, keep it simple to control for even beginners.

Considerate Controller: The control range of 2.4GHz transmitter reaches to 3000 feet high range; battery level and GPS signal shown on the LED screen; a button to turn on or off the drone light is added; right hand throttle mode is available for left-hander. Remember to remove the scratch-proof film from the controller and the camera before use.

Easy to control: The simple flight control system design is equipped with a variety of one-button controls, which makes it easy to get started without complicated control settings. It makes flying simple and fun, and is very suitable for beginners

title: Ruko F11GIM2 Drones with Camera for Adults 4K, 64Mins Flight Time, Gimbal & EIS 4K Camera, 9842ft Digital video Transmission, GPS Auto-return Professional Quadcopter, Level 6 Wind Resistance
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【𝟒𝐊 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐆𝐢𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐀𝐧𝐭𝐢-𝐬𝐡𝐚𝐤𝐞】: This drone captures video at 4K/30fps and photo @4K on SD card. With 2-axis gimbal and Electric Image Stabilization technology, it delivers stable and crystal-clear shots. 5x digital zoom and 80 degrees adjustable lens ensure more flexibal to switch between lenses of different distances and directions.

【𝟔𝟒 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】: F11GIM2 can fly for up to 32 minutes on a single charge. Came with two intelligent batteries, you can have a total of 64mins flight time per trip. Less hasty, and more leisurely. Real-time power level is available on the app and remote control.

【𝟑𝐊𝐌 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐥-𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】: F11GIM2 drone connects via USB with your phone for quick snaps. It has a flying range of up to 9842ft (3KM). Beginner mode limits the flying height and distance to 98ft. Turn off beginner mode to explore distant landscapes.

【𝐄𝐧𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡】: The remote control is improved to a USB connection model with enhance image transmission stability and security, no need to worry losing your view while in the air.

【𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝟔 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】: with the classic design of the F11 series, the drone performs a very stable flight while in the air, along with the powerful but low noise brushless motor, F11GIM2 can resist level 6 winds, so your footage is stable even in a windy circumstances.

【𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬】: the intelligent GPS assisted feature includes the auto-return home, GPS follow me, point of interest, waypoint flight make your fly adventure easy and creative. The app provides intuitive instructions, you can start the game with just few taps.

【𝐅𝐀𝐀 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃】: The drone complies with remote ID requirements. You can find it at the bottom of the drone. If you can't find your drone's RID, please get in touch with us through the contact information on the manual or our website.

【𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐌𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】: ① The smart battery will self-discharge to approximately 50% battery level within one week if no use, please charge the battery before each flight. ②Ensure to utilize a 5V/2A or 5V/3A charger, fully charge time takes around 6-4.5hrs（depends on the charger）. ③Windy circustance will consume the battery faster, mind the flight safety.
【𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞】: ①If you're new to flying drones, practice with Beginner Mode; ②The drone and fly app connection is via the USB connection between remote control and the phone not WiFi.

title: Ruko U11S Drones with Camera for Adults 4k, Built-in Remote ID, 120° FOV, GPS Auto Return, 40 Min Flight, 5G Live Transmission, Foldable Mini FPV Quadcopter for Beginners with Follow Me, Circle Fly, Waypoint
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【FAA Compliance】Ruko U11S drone complies with the FAA Declaration of Compliance, which you can check on the FAA website and will not affect the normal use of the drone. If you have any questions about FAA Remote ID, please feel free to contact the Ruko Customer Support team for assistance.

【Ideal Choice For Your First Flight】It's an entry-level drone with all the basic features that beginners can easily use. Just enjoy playing interactive games with your family and create more precious memories freely.
【90° Adjustable & 4K UHD Camera】90° adjustable 4K camera providing a broader vision, enable to capture perfect UHD pictures and save to your phone directly to better record your precious moments.

【Fly Indoors & Outdoors】[Optical flow positioning] provides you a safer indoor flight while [GPS positioning] gives a more free and stabilized outdoor flight. They also help the drone lock the height precisely and hover stably to take better photos or videos.
【Extend Your Flight Time】An intelligent battery provides a maximum flight time of 20 minutes. An extra battery extends the flight time to 40 mins (2*20 mins), doubles your practice time!

【Beginners Friendly Transmitter】The transmitter can be charged directly, which saves you more time by not having to replace the battery like others. The one-key functions on it are also super easy to operate.

【Perfect Travel Companion】The camera drone can be folded to carry, and its size like a mobile phone makes it lighter and safer than many others. You can take it to anywhere and record all the wonderful moments.
【Considerate Customer Service】Ruko promises a 30 day return and 90 day free warranty. If you have any questions about our products, such as the operation of drones, please feel free to contact us.

【Usage Tips】1. WiFi appears only after the drone and remote controller are linked. It is recommended to finish the connection between the phone and WiFi before entering the RUKO GPS APP. 2. If in an environment with many WiFi, it may be difficult to refresh. 3. If WiFi is disconnected, you can turn on the flight mode of the phone and turn off the VPN. 4. If WiFi is disconnected, it may be caused by surrounding signal interference or obstacles blocking the signal (it is normal to disconnect WiFi signal when flying far and in a complex environment). It is recommended to choose an open environment to fly the drone.

features: 【𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝟖𝐊 𝐈𝐦𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬 & 𝟒𝐊 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨】: With the advanced camera and 1/2 CMOS, you can record breathtaking 8K images and 4K/30fps video directly onto your SD card, offering you an incredible shooting experience. The digital 5x zoom capability also provides greater detail of your view.

【𝟔𝐊𝐌 𝐅𝐏𝐕 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】: The upgraded digital transmission system ensures a more stable flight view and a secure connection, providing you with peace of mind. Never lose sight of your drone during flight, as it extends your vision to an impressive 6 kilometers.

【𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝟖𝟎-𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞】: The package includes two batteries, each capable of providing 40 minutes of flight time. Together, they offer a total of 80 minutes of airtime. The batteries support fast PD3.0 charging, reducing your waiting time. Additionally, the batteries will automatically discharge after 48 days of non-use to ensure battery safety.

【𝟑-𝐀𝐱𝐢𝐬 𝐆𝐢𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐥 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐄𝐈𝐒】: The drone camera boasts a 3-axis gimbal and an EIS anti-shake system, ensuring crystal-clear footage every time you capture. Equipped with a Sony camera featuring a 1/2" CMOS sensor, the drone elevates your shooting experience with Biggly, taking your skills to new heights!

【𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐯𝐢𝐚 𝐀𝐩𝐩】: Our app enhances your flight experience with features like cruise control, waypoint flight, and point of interest. It's easy for beginners and professionals to take stunning videos, allowing you to explore your surroundings in greater detail and create immersive footage.

【𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡】: The drone is equipped with a TOF (Time-of-Flight) sensor, a vision system, and navigation lights, ensuring stable hovering, landing, and easy view tracking. The Auto Return feature automatically brings the drone back to you in case of low battery or loss of connection.

【𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞】: We offer a comprehensive 1-year quality warranty for your peace of mind. For any technical support or inquiries about drone accessories, please reach out to our dedicated Veeniix Support Team for exceptional service and assistance.

title: TENSSENX Foldable GPS Drone with 4K UHD Camera for Adults Beginner, TSRC Q8 FPV RC Quadcopter with Brushless Motor, 5G WiFi Transmission, Follow Me, Optical Flow, Smart Return Home, 90 Min Long Flight
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【𝐔𝐥𝐭𝐫𝐚 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝟒𝐊 𝐀𝐧𝐭𝐢-𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚】: With 4K Ultra HD Camera and 𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭-𝐢𝐧 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐀𝐛𝐬𝐨𝐫𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐡𝐨𝐥𝐝𝐞𝐫, TSRC Q8 guarantees stunning and vivid footage in a bird's-eye view without missing any details. It’s your ticket to the sky.

【𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐎𝐮𝐭𝐝𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】: The super powerful 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬 and 𝟑 𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝟗𝟎 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 ensure a stabler and longer flight and having enough time to compose the perfect pictures. The maximum distance for remote control reaches 𝟏𝐊𝐦/𝟑𝟐𝟖𝟎𝐟𝐭.
【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲】: Multiple functions such as Automatic Take-off, Headless Mode, Altitude Hold, 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 are devised for the novice. Being a drone pilot has never been this easy!

【𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞】: The GPS module and Optical Flow Positioning make TSRC Q8 safer, more reliable and have extraordinary 𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐢-𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 capabilities, offering you the ability to fly farther and more stable. You can have a blast outdoors with your kids or friends without disturbance and restrictions of distance.

【𝐀𝐥𝐥-𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 𝐅𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬】: 𝐅𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐌𝐞, 𝐓𝐚𝐩 𝐅𝐥𝐲, and 𝐏𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭 grant TSRC Q8 performance intelligent flights, freeing your hands up. Your precious memories will start right when you switch on the TSRC Q8.
【𝐍𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐋𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐃𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐞】: The 𝐄𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲 𝐒𝐭𝐨𝐩, 𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞, 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐦𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐞 and 𝐎𝐧𝐞 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧 can prevent TSRC Q8 from losing to a great extent. Don’t hesitate to take it home!

【𝐈𝐝𝐞𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐧】: The intuitive and advanced 𝐟𝐨𝐥𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 design of TSRC Q8 and the carrying case ensure the pilot complete freedom to wherever he wants to go. 𝐋𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝟐𝟒𝟗 𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦𝐬, the weight of TSRC Q8 is as much as a can of coke, 𝐧𝐨 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐀𝐀& 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. TSRC Q8 can definitely be the ideal travel companion!

【𝐊𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫】: TSRC APP is compatible with IOS 7.0 or above/Android 4.4 or above. Any camera connection issue, turn on airplane mode in your phone settings before connecting to WiFi. aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
3D Flip 
It has a crazy cool 360-degree flip function, and the drone can roll in any direction to make flying more exciting. 
Gesture Control 
Post "V" or do "Palm", the drone will take photos or videos within 3 seconds, helping you to take complex photos, suitable for selfie. 
Smart Voice Control 
Turn on the "control switch" and click the "voice control" button. Voice command: Fly Land Forward Backward Left Right Photo Record.You can easily control the drone by voice control and enjoy more fun. 
High/Medium/Low Speed 
It has three speed levels. Press and hold the front left button. The number of beeps indicates its speed level. It is very fast and responsive for its size, especially in the third speed level. 
Stable Hovering 
Dual altitude held technology - optical flow and air pressure - makes hovering very stable and easy for use . When you release the throttle stick , the drone will hover at a certain height . Simple operation and endless fun . When properly trimmed , it will hover steadily in one place . 
Headless Mode 
Headless mode is activated by a button on the controller and is a nice feature that allows you to play with the drone without worrying about the direction it is facing. Headless mode brings more confidence to beginners. 
FPV Transmission 
With FPV transmission, you can see the sky from live video through your smartphone app. And take photos and videos during the flight, you can save photos or videos to your phone or share them to social media. 
Propeller Protection 
It's a good idea to wear propeller guards so that you can protect your child from propeller spin scratch and protect your drone from damage. This is easy to do because it's obvious when propeller guards snap into place. 
One Key Start/Landing 
Drone S20 is magically simple, just tap the One Key Start/Landing button to start flying. Press the button and the drone will automatically take off and hover at the set altitude. If you need to land the drone, press it again. It is easy to control and maneuver, especially for beginners. 
Emergency Stop 
When the aircraft encounters an emergency during flight, long press the remote control "emergency stop" function key to make the aircraft stop urgently to avoid injury. After the aircraft emergency stop, the indicator light will flash and horizontal calibration is required. 
Gravity Control 
Gravity-sensing mode allows the user to control the drone by holding and moving the smartphone. When gravity sensing is on, you will need to long press and hold your fingers on the phone screen to control the drone, as this will prevent the drone from flying around when gravity sensing is on and the phone is not horizontal. 
Remote Controls and Apps 
You can fly the drone using the remote control or your smartphone. However, in order to capture video or images, you must be connected to the drone via WiFi and the "HITURBO FPV" app. If you need to use the voice control, trajectory flight and other functions which under the "control switch" button in the app, you need to disconnect the remote control from the drone and connect the drone to the app separately.

Product Description
Warm tips about the battery: 
1. Please remove the charger in time after charging is complete. 
2. It is recommended to charge and discharge it once a month, do not store with a full charge, keep 50%-60% of the power, the storage temperature is 10-40℃, 
and the best storage temperature is 19-21℃. 
3. If water enters the battery and the battery protection board fails, the battery cannot be used normally, Do not use the battery in rain or in humid environments, as this may cause the battery to self-ignite or even explode. 
4. If the battery is squeezed, deformed and dropped from a high altitude, it is forbidden to use it again. 
5. If the aircraft has not been used for a month, the battery must be removed to prevent the battery from being discharged for a long time.

features: 【𝐋𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐋𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐖𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞】ATOM SE drone weighs 𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠, 𝐧𝐨 𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐅𝐀𝐀& 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐈𝐃 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧. The fold-up design packs up small enough to fit in a jacket pocket. Built-in 𝐛𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 makes the drone 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥-𝟓 𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐝 and fly stably.

【𝟒𝐊 𝐄𝐈𝐒 𝐂𝐚𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐚 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫】The drone is equippied with a 𝟏/𝟑’’ 𝐂𝐌𝐎𝐒 𝐒𝐨𝐧𝐲 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐨𝐫. It can shoot 𝟏𝟐𝐌𝐏 photos and 𝟒𝐊@𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 HD video. The exclusive ShakeVanish tech helps to take more stable and smoother images within 118° FOV and a vertical +20° to -90° camera.

【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲, 𝐒𝐮𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐅𝐥𝐲 𝐅𝐥𝐞𝐱𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥】SurgeFly flight control system provides 𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞 and 3 flight modes - 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨, 𝐍𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐥, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭- allowing you to challenge your skills as you become an advanced pilot with flexible and easy flight control experience. In Sport Mode, the max speed can be up to 16m/s in 2.8s.

【𝟔𝟐 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝟐 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬】The ATOM SE 4K drone comes with 2 intelligent 2500mAh batteries, each Battery running up to 31 minutes, for a total of 𝟔𝟐 𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬. Fly more, charging less. Give you more freedom to record the creative moments around you.

【𝐏𝐢𝐱𝐒𝐲𝐧𝐜 𝟐.𝟎, 𝟒𝐊𝐦 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】The control range is up to 𝟒𝐊𝐦/𝟏𝟑,𝟏𝟐𝟑𝐟𝐭. The PixSync 2.0 technology ensures stable, consistent video in most shooting conditions and enables low latency for HD digital video.

【𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐞 𝐆𝐏𝐒 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐧, 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬】The ATOM SE GPS drone will 𝐬𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐥𝐲 𝐚𝐮𝐭𝐨-𝐟𝐥𝐲 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤 to the take-off point when it's lost signal or is in low power. Easy to control for all levels. You can have even more fun with features like Follow Me, Waypoint Flight, and Circle Flight of the drone. Dive into more flying possibilities.
【𝐀𝐥𝐰𝐚𝐲𝐬 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠】 All firmware supports FOTA, we recommend keeping up to date with the latest firmware to enjoy the ever-improving flight experience and shooting quality.

【𝐊𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫】 ATOM SE is compatible with IOS 11 and Android 7.0 or above, and we offer 3 types of adapter cables (Micro/Type C/Lightning) to connect your phone and the remote control, you can choose the one you need.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
ATOM SE Expansion Kit -2 Batteries, 62mins Flight Time 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
SurgeFly: Speed Up to 16m/s in 2.8s 
Fast Takeoff with Brushless Motor 

The special ATOM SE SurgeFly supports fast takeoff, increases stability and reduces operational errors. In Sport mode, the speed of the drone can be increased from 0 to 2.8s to 16m/s. This means that the drone has a short reaction time and can catch up with faster dynamic objects. 
More Stable Transmission 
PixSync 2.0, 4km/13,123ft Transmission Range 

The 12MP camera delivers impressive image and video quality. Accompanied by 4K/30fps video and ShakeVanish technology for more stable and smooth aerial shots. 
The built-in PixSync 2.0 enables the ATOM SE to transmit up to 4km, giving you a wider view of this world. 
Lighter, Faster 
Scale 5 Wind Resistance 

Weighing less than 249g/0.55lbs, the ATOM SE drone is about the same as a smartphone and fits in your pocket. And in the United States and Canada, you can fly the ATOM SE camera drones without registration. 
ATOM SE can withstand scale 5 winds, so your footage is stable even when flying in windy conditions. 
GPS Auto Return 
One Key Back / Low Battery / Signal Loss 

When the signal is lost, the battery is low or the auto-return button is pressed, the ATOM SE drone will automatically return to the take-off position, without worrying about losing the drone, just enjoy the flight. 
High-precision GPS 
Follow Me / Waypoint Flight / Circle Flight 

Simply connect to the PotensicPro app with your phone, press the Circle Flight button in the app and set the radius and the drone will fly a circle around the target. 
To use the Waypoint feature, just set the route on the map and the drone will fly along the location you set. 
You can also use the Follow Me feature to have the drone automatically follow you. Dive into more possibilities

features: [Foldable and Portable Design]: SIMREX X800 mini drone is light, equipped with a 1080P camera, adjustable 90 lens, and weighs only 96g. title: 2024-2025 FAA Drone License Exam Guide: A Simplified Approach to Passing the FAA Part 107 Drone License Exam at a Sitting with Test Questions and Answers
author: Darren Ramsay
breadCrumbs: Books › Engineering & Transportation › Transportation › Aviation › Piloting & Flight Instruction
bookDescription:
ACE YOUR FAA PART 107 AT A SITTING
Unlock your path to becoming a licensed drone pilot effortlessly with the "2024-2025 FAA Drone License Exam Guide." This meticulously crafted book offers a simplified yet comprehensive approach to ace the FAA Part 107 Drone License Exam in a single sitting. Authored by an expert in the field, this guide is your ultimate companion, providing the knowledge and confidence you need to succeed.
Packed with test questions and expertly curated answers, this guide equips you with the essential tools to breeze through the exam. Say goodbye to overwhelming study materials – here, you'll find a concise and structured resource that demystifies complex topics, ensuring a smooth and efficient learning process.
Whether you're a novice or seasoned drone enthusiast, this book caters to all levels of expertise. Its user-friendly format, coupled with a simplified breakdown of the exam's core concepts, guarantees a hassle-free journey toward your FAA Drone License. No more juggling through endless materials – this guide streamlines your preparation, making your success within reach.
Don't let the exam stand between you and your passion for drones. Let the "2024-2025 FAA Drone License Exam Guide" be your gateway to securing your license confidently and swiftly. Embrace this definitive resource and soar into the skies as a certified drone pilot!
In this comprehensive guide, listeners will discover:
Comprehensive Exam Preparation: A systematic breakdown of the FAA Part 107 Drone License Exam, covering all essential topics in an easy-to-follow format.
Test Questions and Answers: A curated collection of test questions accompanied by expertly crafted answers to reinforce learning and boost confidence.
Simplified Approach: Complex concepts simplified for quick comprehension, ensuring a smooth learning experience.
Focused Content: Streamlined content that eliminates overwhelming study materials, allowing for targeted and efficient exam preparation.

title: Drone with Camera for Adults, 1080P FPV Drones for kids Beginners with Upgrade Altitude Hold, Voice Control, Gestures Selfie, 90° Adjustable Lens, 3D Flips, 2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: 【User-friendly and Versatile】Loiley drones are perfect for beginners and children, offering features like one-key takeoff/landing, altitude hold, emergency stop, and headless mode. It also provides smart app control (APP name: Loiley Fly), allowing users to define flight routes, use voice control and gesture selfies, and enjoy various functions like 360° flips, gravity sensing, and adding music and filters.

【Real-time Image Transmission and HD Photography】This small drone is equipped with an HD 1080P camera to capture stunning photos and videos with high quality and frame rate. The camera angle can be adjusted remotely up to 90 degrees. Combined with the upgraded hover system and optical flow positioning technology, the camera drone is more stable when shooting. Wi-Fi real-time transmission enables quickly sharing happy moments with family and friends.

【Take it Anywhere】 Loiley drone with camera is your ultimate travel buddy! It's so compact and lightweight that you can literally fold it up and fit it in your pocket or backpack. Weight under 250g to save you from FAA registration. Whether you're going on an outdoor adventure or exploring new places, you can easily take this mini drone with you and capture amazing aerial shots wherever you go.

【Safe and Long Battery Life】With two rechargeable drone batteries, this kids drone extends the flight time to approximately 25-30 minutes, providing a worry-free flying experience. The batteries are easy to charge and replace, with built-in overvoltage protection. The remote controller emits a low battery warning, ensuring beginners never lose their RC drone.

【Professional After-Sales Support】A mini drone with a camera makes for a cool and creative gift. Along with that, the package includes a portable bag for outdoor travel. The drone comes with propeller guards, spare fan blades, and remote control batteries, ensuring safety and reliability. Additionally, 24-hour technical support, quality warranty, and money-back services are provided for customer satisfaction.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
4DV2 Mini Drone for Kids Beginners Adults 
1. Optical altitude hold 
2. One key take-off & landing / Return 
3. One key Emergency Stop 
4. 3 speed control (Low/Medium/High) 
5. Headless mode 
6. 3D Flip and 360° Rotation 
Altitude Hold Mode 
This mode allows the drone to hover in place without any input from the controller. The drone will maintain it's height and position allowing you to pass the controller around or take a quick break. 
3D Flip and 360° Rotation 
Perform impressive stunts for your friends and family to enjoy. The flip feature of this drone means it can roll forward, backward, left and right at the touch of a button. 
One Key Return/One-Key Take-off/Landing 
The drone can fly back automatic by remote control, just press the one key return button, so it can't be lost. 
This feature allows the drone to lift up from the ground automatically and stay hovering. Pressing the button again, and the drone will slowly descend and touch down. 
Safer Design For Kids 
Soft propeller guards and a secure battery slot make it safer when flying. 
3 Speed Adjustment 
It allows beginners to start off slow and safe. More experienced pilots have the choice to really push the drone to its limits with the high-speed sports setting. 
30 minute flight 
Come with 3 removable and chargeable drone batteries in the package, your flight time can be prolonged up to 30 Minutes.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the unmanned aerial vehicle fun to fly around the house. They say it's easy to use and good for beginners. However, some customers have reported issues with functionality, such as the drone not working properly after 20 minutes of cumulative use. There are also complaints about the camera not working properly. Opinions vary on durability, ease of use, value for money, battery life, and size.

title: Drone with Camera 1080P for Beginners, 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟱 𝗡𝗘𝗪 Foldable Drone with Upgrade Altitude Hold, Gestures Selfie, Waypoint Fly, Headless Mode, 3D Flip, One Key Start, 3 Speed Mode, Circle Fly, 2 Batteries
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games › Remote & App Controlled Vehicles & Parts › Quadcopters & Multirotors
features: Perfect Drone Toy Gift for Beginners: Ideal for those new to drone flying, this drone features Optical Flow Positioning for stable hovering, ensuring easy control and high-quality footage. The cool lighting design adds extra fun, making it a great gift for friends and family.

Adjustable 1080P Camera: Equipped with a 1080P HD camera with an adjustable angle, the mini drone captures stunning aerial photos and videos. Using the “Redrie Fly” app and FPV transmission, you can enjoy real-time video streaming and control the drone from greater distances. Explore landscapes, capture moments, and share the joy with friends.

Easy Flight Control: Featuring a one-key start/landing function, this drone is simple and convenient to control, allowing you to enjoy one-button flight anytime, anywhere. With enhanced motors, it offers a gradual increase in speed, starting at a comfortable pace and then moving to faster speeds. Perfect for beginners!

Longer Playtime: Enjoy up to 25 minutes of flight time with two rechargeable batteries. With features like over-current protection, emergency stop, 4 propeller guards, and a low power alarm, you can experience a safe and reliable flight.

Multiple Fun Features: Discover a variety of exciting functions, including waypoint flight, gesture selfies, 360° flips, voice control, circle flight, spin flight, 3-speed modes, headless mode, and one-key takeoff/landing. Snap selfies with gestures or perform thrilling aerial stunts. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot, our drone offers an enjoyable and adventurous flying experience.

Foldable and Portable Design: With its compact size and included storage case, this mini drone makes an excellent gift for friends and family. For your first flight, we recommend an open area. We provide 24-hour technical support, a quality warranty, and a refund guarantee for all customers. If you encounter any issues with the drone, remote control, or app, contact the seller for a quick solution.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
REDRIE JY02 Foldable Drone with Camera for Kids and Beginners 
The video showcases the product in use.The video guides you through product setup.The video compares multiple products.The video shows the product being unpacked.
The ideal flying partner and toy gift for young adventurers, bringing excitement and joy! 
Circle Fly 
Press the button and the drone will fly in a circle with a center of about 2 meters. 
Rotating Fly 
Press the button and the drone will automatically rotate and you can get a 360° View 
Waypoint Fly 
Easily create a flight path by drawing with your finger, and the drone will fly along the path you've created. 
360° Flip 
This drone can perform rolls in any direction, bringing more fun to your flights. 
3 Speeds 
With enhanced motors, this drone can achieve higher flight speeds.Starts you off at a comfortable pace and then moves to a faster pace. 
Gravity Control 
Just like in a mobile racing car game, you can control this drone by tilting your phone, making it easy and fun to fly. 
Safe flight 
The drone remote features low battery alerts, providing a 30s advance warning for returning and auto-landing upon battery depletion. 
Voice Control 
Control the drone with your voice commands like Fly, Land, Forward, Backward, Left, Right, Photo, or Record – the drone will fly as you said.
